original: @221b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @221b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: phra m'a na pa r'i ksha /
analyzed: phra m'a na pa r'i ksha /
translated: Pramana-vartika

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: tshad ma brtag pa /
analyzed: tshad ma brtag pa /
translated: Examination of Valid Cognition

original: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Omniscient One!🔽I bow to that valid cognition

original: gang gi che ba rnams kyis shes par ma gyur pa //
analyzed: gang gi che ba rnams kyis shes par ma gyur pa //
translated: Which, by its greatness, has not been understood🔽By those who are attached to the world,

original: sdug bsngal brgyud pa zhi ba'i go 'phang chen po ni //
analyzed: sdug bsngal brgyud pa zhi ba'i go 'phang chen po ni //
translated: And which, having revealed the great state of peace of the continuum of suffering,

original: rab tu bstan nas don gnyer tshogs kyis thob mdzad pa'i //🔽tshad mar gyur pa de la bdag ni rab tu 'dud //
analyzed: rab tu bstan nas don gnyer tshogs kyis thob mdzad pa'i // tshad mar gyur pa de la bdag ni rab tu 'dud //
translated: Causes the assembly of those who seek the goal to attain it.

original: tshad ma ni mi slu bar byed pa'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: tshad ma ni mi slu bar byed pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: Valid cognition is a non-deceptive cognition.

original: mi slu bar byed pa ni don byed nus pa'i dngos por rab tu bstan pa thob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi slu bar byed pa ni don byed nus pa'i dngos por rab tu bstan pa thob par byed pa'o //
translated: Non-deceptive means that which causes the attainment of the object that is able to perform a function.

original: thob par byed pa nyid ni 'jug pa'i yul ston par byed pa nyid kyis 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: thob par byed pa nyid ni 'jug pa'i yul ston par byed pa nyid kyis 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: Causing attainment is causing engagement by revealing the engaged object.

original: des na tshad ma'i bya ba ni thob par byed pa nyid kyis yan lag tu gyur pa rab tu ston par byed pa nyid de //
analyzed: des na tshad ma'i bya ba ni thob par byed pa nyid kyis yan lag tu gyur pa rab tu ston par byed pa nyid de //
translated: Therefore, the function of valid cognition is revealing as an aspect that which causes attainment.

original: mthong ba nyid du lhag par zhen pa'i mngon sum gyis don rab tu bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: mthong ba nyid du lhag par zhen pa'i mngon sum gyis don rab tu bstan pa yin la /
translated: Direct perception is taught by the direct perception that is attached to the extreme of seeing.

original: ma mthong ba 'khrul pa med pa'i rtags kyis nges pa ni rjes su dpag pas bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: ma mthong ba 'khrul pa med pa'i rtags kyis nges pa ni rjes su dpag pas bstan pa yin no //
translated: Inference is taught by the inference that is the nonerroneous sign of not seeing.

original: ci ste tshad ma zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig / gang gis @222a * //
analyzed: ci ste tshad ma zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig / gang gis @222a * //
translated: Now, what is this so-called valid knowledge?

original: 'jal bar byed pa de yin no zhe na ni tshad ma thams cad shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jal bar byed pa de yin no zhe na ni tshad ma thams cad shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is that by which one measures, then all valid knowledge is cognition.

original: ci ste gang gis dngos po 'dzin pa de tshad ma yin na /
analyzed: ci ste gang gis dngos po 'dzin pa de tshad ma yin na /
translated: But if that by which one apprehends an object is valid knowledge,

original: ci dngos po 'dzin pa de yang phyogs su lhung bas rnam par dpyad par bya ba'am /
analyzed: ci dngos po 'dzin pa de yang phyogs su lhung bas rnam par dpyad par bya ba'am /
translated: is that apprehension of an object to be analyzed because it is biased,

original: 'on te nye bar mkho ba nyid kyis yin /
analyzed: 'on te nye bar mkho ba nyid kyis yin /
translated: or is it because it is useful?

original: de la re zhig dngos po 'dzin pa ni rtog pa dang ldan pa don bya ba don du gnyer ba la mkho ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de la re zhig dngos po 'dzin pa ni rtog pa dang ldan pa don bya ba don du gnyer ba la mkho ba ma yin te /
translated: First, the apprehension of an object is not useful for the conceptual to pursue the activity of an object,

original: de las don bya ba las mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las don bya ba las mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because from that, the activity of an object is not accomplished.

original: don bya ba bsgrub pa'i thabs yin no zhe na /
analyzed: don bya ba bsgrub pa'i thabs yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is the means of accomplishing the activity of an object,

original: gzung ba'i skad cig ma gang yin pa de mi 'thob pa yin nam /
analyzed: gzung ba'i skad cig ma gang yin pa de mi 'thob pa yin nam /
translated: Is it the case that one does not obtain the momentary object of apprehension?

original: zhen par byas pa'i rgyun thob par bya ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: zhen par byas pa'i rgyun thob par bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Or is it the case that one obtains the continuum that is the object of adherence?

original: de lta na ni rgyun gyi yul can gyi zhen pa thob par byed pa yin gyi 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na ni rgyun gyi yul can gyi zhen pa thob par byed pa yin gyi 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: If it is the former, then one would obtain the object of adherence, but not the object of apprehension.

original: des na 'di ltar rnam par rtog pa can gyi rjes su dpag pa gang yin pa de yang thob par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di ltar rnam par rtog pa can gyi rjes su dpag pa gang yin pa de yang thob par byed pa yin no //
translated: Thus, even the inference of the conceptualist would be obtaining.

original: de lta na ni 'o na don bya ba nus pa rtogs pa tshad ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na don bya ba nus pa rtogs pa tshad ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then valid cognition is the understanding of the object’s ability to perform a function.

original: rtogs pas kyang don bya ba don du gnyer ba la mkho ba med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rtogs pas kyang don bya ba don du gnyer ba la mkho ba med pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t it the case that even understanding does not help one who seeks to perform a function?

original: de las don bya ba mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las don bya ba mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one does not accomplish the function from that.

original: don bya bar nus pa thob pa'i thabs yin no zhe na /
analyzed: don bya bar nus pa thob pa'i thabs yin no zhe na /
translated: It is the means of obtaining the object’s ability to perform a function.

original: de lta na ni 'o na don bya bar nus pa thob par byed pa nyid rtogs pa dang ldan pa don du gnyer bar bya ba'i phyir de nyid bstan bcos las rnam par dpyad par 'os kyi /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na don bya bar nus pa thob par byed pa nyid rtogs pa dang ldan pa don du gnyer bar bya ba'i phyir de nyid bstan bcos las rnam par dpyad par 'os kyi /
translated: If that is so, then it is proper to analyze in the treatise just that which causes the attainment of the realization of the ability to perform an action, because it is the object of the one who seeks realization.

original: don bya bar nus pa rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don bya bar nus pa rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the realization of the ability to perform an action.🔽Even if the realization of the ability to perform an action exists, it is not because the object of the one who seeks realization is completely fulfilled.

original: gang gi phyir don bya bar nus pa'i rtogs pa yod du zin kyang shes pa la don du gnyer bar bya ba'i don du gnyer ba nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang shes pa'i rang bzhin don bya bar nus pa'i thob par byed🔽pa nyid kyi tshe rjes su tshol bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don bya bar nus pa'i rtogs pa yod du zin kyang shes pa la don du gnyer bar bya ba'i don du gnyer ba nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang shes pa'i rang bzhin don bya bar nus pa'i thob par byed pa nyid kyi tshe rjes su tshol bar byed pa yin no //
translated: But rather, when the nature of consciousness causes the attainment of the ability to perform an action, it is sought after.

original: gang gi phyir gal te yang rtogs pa nyid thob par byed pa yin pa de lta na yang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni shes pa don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gal te yang rtogs pa nyid thob par byed pa yin pa de lta na yang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni shes pa don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Even if realization itself causes attainment, still the nature of realization is not the object of the one who seeks realization.

original: 'on kyang don thob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang don thob par byed pa'o //
translated: But rather, it causes the attainment of the object.

original: de'i phyir don bya bar nus pa la mi slu ba nyid tshad ma yin gyi don bya ba rtogs pa na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir don bya bar nus pa la mi slu ba nyid tshad ma yin gyi don bya ba rtogs pa na ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the valid cognition is the nondeceptive with regard to the object to be attained, but not with regard to the object to be cognized.

original: sgra'i don gyi rjes su yang 'brang bar bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: sgra'i don gyi rjes su yang 'brang bar bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: But is it not also to be followed with regard to the meaning of the word?

original: gal te mi slu bar byed pa nyid tshad ma yin na ni sgra'i don btang ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mi slu bar byed pa nyid tshad ma yin na ni sgra'i don btang ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If the nondeceptive is the valid cognition, then the meaning of the word is abandoned.

original: btang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: btang ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not abandoned.

original: gang gi phyir mi slu bar byed pa nyid ni rab tu bstan pa thob pas byed pa la brjod la de yang 'jug pa'i yul rab tu ston par byed pa la brjod pa yin no @222b zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mi slu bar byed pa nyid ni rab tu bstan pa thob pas byed pa la brjod la de yang 'jug pa'i yul rab tu ston par byed pa la brjod pa yin no @222b zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the nondeceptive is said to be the activity of the one who has obtained the teaching, and that is said to be the teaching of the object of engagement.

original: de lta na yang shes pas gzhal ba gang yin pa de thob par byed pa tshad ma yin pa'i phyir de thob pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba'i 'jal ba'i tshad ma yin gyi 'ba' zhig pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang shes pas gzhal ba gang yin pa de thob par byed pa tshad ma yin pa'i phyir de thob pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba'i 'jal ba'i tshad ma yin gyi 'ba' zhig pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Even so, since the valid cognition is the attainment of that which is cognized by the cognition, it is the valid cognition of the object to be attained, and it is not the valid cognition of the object to be cognized.

original: dper na rdza mkhan gyi sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ni rdza mkhan gyi rigs kyi khyad par yin pa de bzhin du tshad ma'i sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu yang thob pa'i yan lag gi 'jal byed yin no //
analyzed: dper na rdza mkhan gyi sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ni rdza mkhan gyi rigs kyi khyad par yin pa de bzhin du tshad ma'i sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu yang thob pa'i yan lag gi 'jal byed yin no //
translated: For example, the reason for applying the term “potter” is the particular type of potter; in the same way, the cause for applying the term “valid cognition” is the instrument of knowing that is a part of obtaining.

original: thob pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba'i 'jal bar byed pa la yang slu ba med pa can gyi shes par lta'o //
analyzed: thob pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba'i 'jal bar byed pa la yang slu ba med pa can gyi shes par lta'o //
translated: And the instrument of knowing that is a part of obtaining is also seen as a nondeceptive consciousness.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: tshad ma slu med can shes pa //🔽zhes bya ba dang / bsam pa la ni slu med phyir //
analyzed: tshad ma slu med can shes pa // zhes bya ba dang / bsam pa la ni slu med phyir //
translated: it is said that “valid cognition is a nondeceptive consciousness,”

original: 'khrul pa yin yang tshad ma nyid //
analyzed: 'khrul pa yin yang tshad ma nyid //
translated: and “even though it is mistaken, it is valid cognition because it is nondeceptive with respect to the object of apprehension.”

original: ces bya ba dang 'di gnyis kyi don yongs su gcad nas 'jug pa na don bya ba la slu bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba dang 'di gnyis kyi don yongs su gcad nas 'jug pa na don bya ba la slu bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: When the meaning of these two statements is ascertained and applied, it is said that one will not be deceived with respect to the object of activity.

original: gtan tshigs thigs pa las kyang rnam par rtog pa de las kyang der lhag par zhen pas 'jug la /
analyzed: gtan tshigs thigs pa las kyang rnam par rtog pa de las kyang der lhag par zhen pas 'jug la /
translated: In the Drop of Reasons it is also said that “from that conception, one engages by way of excessive adherence to that.”

original: zhugs pa na yang rnam par rtog pa mngon sum du grub pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhes 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi dngos po nyid thob par byed pa nyid la tshad mar bshad do //
analyzed: zhugs pa na yang rnam par rtog pa mngon sum du grub pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhes 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi dngos po nyid thob par byed pa nyid la tshad mar bshad do //
translated: and when it has entered, because the direct establishment of the conceptual differentiation is not different from it, it is explained that it is a valid cognition in the sense of establishing the attainment of the thing itself, which is preceded by the entry.

original: mi slu ba'i rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir tshad ma'i sgra nyid kyis rab tu bstan pa thob par byed pa'i don thob po //
analyzed: mi slu ba'i rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir tshad ma'i sgra nyid kyis rab tu bstan pa thob par byed pa'i don thob po //
translated: And because it is a synonym of non-deceptive, the meaning of establishing the attainment is attained by the word valid cognition itself.

original: de lta na yang ma rtogs pa'i yul can tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba yang rang gi mtshan nyid ma rtogs pa zhes khyad par du bya'o zhes bya ba 'di yang tshad ma'i sgra nyid kyis mi slu ba nyid thob pa na rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs
analyzed: de lta na yang ma rtogs pa'i yul can tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba yang rang gi mtshan nyid ma rtogs pa zhes khyad par du bya'o zhes bya ba 'di yang tshad ma'i sgra nyid kyis mi slu ba nyid thob pa na rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs
translated: Even so, the subject that has not understood is a valid cognition, and the statement “it is a valid cognition that has not understood its own specifically characterized object” should be qualified in this way. And this is explained as follows: when non-deceptiveness is attained by the word valid cognition itself, the understanding of the specifically characterized object is attained by the word valid cognition itself.

original: pa zhes gnyi ga tshad ma'i sgra'i shugs kyis rnam par gnas so zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa zhes gnyi ga tshad ma'i sgra'i shugs kyis rnam par gnas so zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus both are established by the force of the word valid cognition.

original: de'i phyir mi slu bar byed pa rab tu bstan pa thob par byed pa ni tshad ma nyid yin par dgongs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir mi slu bar byed pa rab tu bstan pa thob par byed pa ni tshad ma nyid yin par dgongs so //
translated: Therefore, the intended meaning is that valid knowledge is that which is nondeceptive in the sense of being a means of obtaining what is taught.🔽Just as the world says that a means of valid knowledge is nondeceptive in the sense of being a means of obtaining what is asserted, in the same way, since consciousness is nondeceptive in the sense of being a means of obtaining what is taught, it is called valid knowledge.

original: 'jig rten ni dam bcas pa thob par byed pa mi slu bar byed pa'i tshad ma yin nam zhes brjod pa de bzhin du shes pa yang rab tu ston pa thob par byed pas mi slu bar gyur pa ni tshad mar brjod pa'i phyir tshad ma'i sgra'i don
analyzed: 'jig rten ni dam bcas pa thob par byed pa mi slu bar byed pa'i tshad ma yin nam zhes brjod pa de bzhin du shes pa yang rab tu ston pa thob par byed pas mi slu bar gyur pa ni tshad mar brjod pa'i phyir tshad ma'i sgra'i don
translated: Therefore the meaning of the term valid knowledge is nondeceptive.

original: mi slu ba yin pa ni 'jig rten pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi slu ba yin pa ni 'jig rten pa nyid do //
translated: This is the position of the world.

original: shes pa skad cig ma ji ltar don thob par byed pa yin zhe na /🔽kye don gyi yul du skyes bu skyel ba 'am /
analyzed: shes pa skad cig ma ji ltar don thob par byed pa yin zhe na / kye don gyi yul du skyes bu skyel ba 'am /
translated: How can a momentary consciousness be a means of obtaining an object?

original: skyes bu'i yul du don 'gugs pa thob par byed pa'i tshad ma yin nam /
analyzed: skyes bu'i yul du don 'gugs pa thob par byed pa'i tshad ma yin nam /
translated: Is it that a person is brought to the place of the object or that the object is brought to the place of the person?🔽What is the means of obtaining it?🔽By what means is it obtained?

original: ci nas gang gis skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir thob par byed par @223a * //🔽mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci nas gang gis skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir thob par byed par @223a * //🔽mi 'gyur ro //
translated: By what means is it obtained?

original: 'o na ji lta zhe na thob par byed pa nyid ni thob par bya ba'i yul la 'jug par byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'o na ji lta zhe na thob par byed pa nyid ni thob par bya ba'i yul la 'jug par byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: If that is so, then what is it? It is the engagement in the object to be attained.

original: des na tshad ma'i thob par byed pa nyid ni 'jug par byed pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: des na tshad ma'i thob par byed pa nyid ni 'jug par byed pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the instrumentality of valid cognition is not the engagement.

original: 'jug par byed pa yang 'jug pa'i yul rab tu ston par byed pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'jug par byed pa yang 'jug pa'i yul rab tu ston par byed pa nyid de /
translated: And the engagement is the indication of the object of engagement.

original: gang gi tshe 'dis 'jug pa'i yul rab tu bstan pa de'i tshe skyes bu rab tu 'jug cing don kyang thob pa'i phyir tshad ma'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'dis 'jug pa'i yul rab tu bstan pa de'i tshe skyes bu rab tu 'jug cing don kyang thob pa'i phyir tshad ma'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
translated: When it indicates the object of engagement, then the person engages and attains the object, and so the function of valid cognition is complete.

original: gal te rab tu ston par byed pa nyid tshad ma'i bya ba yin no //🔽'o na mi slu ba nyid ni rab tu ston par byed pa yin no zhes de ltar bya ba yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rab tu ston par byed pa nyid tshad ma'i bya ba yin no // 'o na mi slu ba nyid ni rab tu ston par byed pa yin no zhes de ltar bya ba yin nam /
translated: If the indication is the function of valid cognition,🔽then is the nondeceptive the indication?

original: mi slu ba ni rab tu bstan pa thob par byed ces ci'i phyir brjod /
analyzed: mi slu ba ni rab tu bstan pa thob par byed ces ci'i phyir brjod /
translated: Why is it said that the nondeceptive is the instrumentality of the indication?

original: rab tu ston par byed pa nyid thob par byed pa yin no zhe na ni rab tu bstan pa thob par byed pa zhes brjod pa na rab tu bstan pa thob par byed pa'i tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don du rtogs par 'gyur na /
analyzed: rab tu ston par byed pa nyid thob par byed pa yin no zhe na ni rab tu bstan pa thob par byed pa zhes brjod pa na rab tu bstan pa thob par byed pa'i tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don du rtogs par 'gyur na /
translated: If it is said that it is the means of attaining the state of being a revealer, then when one says that it is the means of attaining the state of being a revealer, it is understood to mean that it is a valid means of knowledge that attains the state of being a revealer.

original: de lta na ni rigs shing don 'brel pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na ni rigs shing don 'brel pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If that is so, it is not reasonable and is not related to the meaning.

original: dpe'i rab tu ston par byed pa nyid ni tshad ma ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dpe'i rab tu ston par byed pa nyid ni tshad ma ma yin gyi /
translated: The state of being a revealing example is not a valid means of knowledge,

original: 'on kyang thob par byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang thob par byed pa nyid do //
translated: but rather it is the means of attaining.

original: 'on kyang ci zhig byas pas thob par byed pa yin zhes 'dri ba na rab tu ston par byed pas na 'jug par byed pa yin no zhes 'jug par byed pa'i rgyu nyid rab tu ston bar byed par brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang ci zhig byas pas thob par byed pa yin zhes 'dri ba na rab tu ston par byed pas na 'jug par byed pa yin no zhes 'jug par byed pa'i rgyu nyid rab tu ston bar byed par brjod pa yin la /
translated: But when asked what is done to attain, it is said that the cause of engagement is revealed by the statement that it engages by revealing.

original: rab tu ston par byed pa'i thabs kyis rab tu 'jug par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rab tu ston par byed pa'i thabs kyis rab tu 'jug par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: It is the means of engagement by the method of revealing,

original: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: not by anything else.

original: de'i phyir de ltar re zhig thob par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyis ston par byed pa tshad ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar re zhig thob par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyis ston par byed pa tshad ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, in this way, the teacher is a valid cognition by the very fact that he causes attainment.

original: 'ba' zhig pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig pa ni ma yin no //
translated: He is not just a valid cognition by himself.

original: des na rab tu bstan pa thob par byed pa nyid tshad mar brjod de /
analyzed: des na rab tu bstan pa thob par byed pa nyid tshad mar brjod de /
translated: Thus, the teacher is said to be a valid cognition because he causes attainment of what is taught.

original: 'di la de kho na'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di la de kho na'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of thatness is as follows.

original: shes pa 'ba' zhig gis don thob par byed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: shes pa 'ba' zhig gis don thob par byed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: An object is not attained by a cognition by itself alone.

original: 'on kyang tshogs pa mang pos yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang tshogs pa mang pos yin no //
translated: Rather, it is attained by a multitude of factors.

original: de dag las 'ga' zhig ni rnam pa ji zhig ltar thob pa la nye bar sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: de dag las 'ga' zhig ni rnam pa ji zhig ltar thob pa la nye bar sbyor ba yin no //
translated: Among them, some are applied to the attainment of the object in some way.

original: shes pa ni 'jug pa'i yul ston pa nyid kyis thob pa las nye bar sbyor gyi rnam pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pa ni 'jug pa'i yul ston pa nyid kyis thob pa las nye bar sbyor gyi rnam pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: Cognition is applied to attainment by the very fact that it reveals the engaged object, but not by any other means.

original: dper na gsad par bya ba gcig la mnga' bdag dang / dbang po dang yi ge dang / rigs ngan rnams las 'ga' zhig ni rnam pa ci zhig ltar gsod par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: dper na gsad par bya ba gcig la mnga' bdag dang / dbang po dang yi ge dang / rigs ngan rnams las 'ga' zhig ni rnam pa ci zhig ltar gsod par byed pa yin la /
translated: For example, with regard to a single person to be killed, the king, the executioner, the scribe, and the low-caste man, some are applied to killing in some way.

original: bdag po @223b ni bka' bsgo ba nyid kyis gsod par byed pa yin no zhes brjod pa'i phyir gsod par lung bsgo ba nyid kyis gsod par byed pa ni bdag po yin par brjod do //
analyzed: bdag po @223b ni bka' bsgo ba nyid kyis gsod par byed pa yin no zhes brjod pa'i phyir gsod par lung bsgo ba nyid kyis gsod par byed pa ni bdag po yin par brjod do //
translated: The master is the one who kills by ordering the killing.

original: 'di la gsod pa'i yan lag ma yin par gsod par lung bsgo ba la gsod byed du brjod pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di la gsod pa'i yan lag ma yin par gsod par lung bsgo ba la gsod byed du brjod pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Here, the one who orders the killing is not called the killer when he is not a limb of the killing.

original: 'on kyang gsod pa'i yan lag kho na'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang gsod pa'i yan lag kho na'o //
translated: But he is a limb of the killing.

original: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni 'jug par byed pa nyid kyis thob par byed pa yin no zhes brjod pa'i don du ston par byed pa la thob par brjod do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni 'jug par byed pa nyid kyis thob par byed pa yin no zhes brjod pa'i don du ston par byed pa la thob par brjod do //
translated: Similarly, consciousness is called the appropriator because it is taught that it is the appropriator by its very nature of engaging.

original: 'dir thob pa'i yan lag ma yin pa rab tu ston par byed par tshad mar byed pa la tshad mar brjod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir thob pa'i yan lag ma yin pa rab tu ston par byed par tshad mar byed pa la tshad mar brjod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, the one who is the measure of the one who is taught to be the limb of the appropriator is not called the appropriator.

original: des na rab tu ston pa thob par byed pa tshad ma ma yin gyi ston par byed pa tsam ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs par brjod pa yin no// gal te mngon sum pa ni bstan pa'i dngos po thob par byed pa ma yin
analyzed: des na rab tu ston pa thob par byed pa tshad ma ma yin gyi ston par byed pa tsam ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs par brjod pa yin no// gal te mngon sum pa ni bstan pa'i dngos po thob par byed pa ma yin
translated: If direct perception does not obtain the object that is taught,

original: te / de ni skad cig ma las phan chad du med pa'i phyir ci zhig thob /
analyzed: te / de ni skad cig ma las phan chad du med pa'i phyir ci zhig thob /
translated: what is obtained, since it does not exist beyond the moment?

original: rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it inference,

original: rjes su dpag pas gzung ba gang yin pa de ni dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir dang / ma bzung ba yang mi thob pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas gzung ba gang yin pa de ni dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir dang / ma bzung ba yang mi thob pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because that which is grasped by inference is not a real thing, and that which is not grasped is not obtained.

original: shes pa rnams kyi yul yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: shes pa rnams kyi yul yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The objects of consciousness are also of two kinds:

original: gzung ba dang lhag par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: gzung ba dang lhag par zhen pa'o //
translated: grasped and imagined.

original: gzung ba ni gang dngos po 'am dngos po med pa gzung ba'o //
analyzed: gzung ba ni gang dngos po 'am dngos po med pa gzung ba'o //
translated: The grasped is either a real thing or a non-thing.

original: lhag par zhen pa ni 'di ni 'di'i tshe 'di na'o zhes lhag par zhen par byas pa'o //
analyzed: lhag par zhen pa ni 'di ni 'di'i tshe 'di na'o zhes lhag par zhen par byas pa'o //
translated: The imagined is the imagination that this is here at this time.

original: de la skad cig ma nyid bzhin du bzung ba zhen par ma byas pa ni 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: de la skad cig ma nyid bzhin du bzung ba zhen par ma byas pa ni 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //
translated: Just as it is not momentary, it is not an object of engagement when it is not conceived.

original: 'di 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa yang ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: 'di 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa yang ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is it not an object of engagement?🔽That which cannot be engaged by means of a definite object, time, and aspect is not an object of engagement.

original: gang zhig yul dang dus dang rnam pa nges pa nges par tha snyad byar mi nus pa de la ji ltar 'jug pa ma nges pa de ni tha snyad du bya ba ma yin pas na 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa ni thob par nus pa ma yin
analyzed: gang zhig yul dang dus dang rnam pa nges pa nges par tha snyad byar mi nus pa de la ji ltar 'jug pa ma nges pa de ni tha snyad du bya ba ma yin pas na 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa ni thob par nus pa ma yin
translated: Since it is not an object of engagement, it is not an object of engagement.

original: no // mngon sum gyi gzung ba skad cig ma ni thob par nus pa ma yin la /
analyzed: no // mngon sum gyi gzung ba skad cig ma ni thob par nus pa ma yin la /
translated: The object of direct perception is not momentary,

original: rjes su dpag pa'i gzung ba yang dngos po med pa yin la /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i gzung ba yang dngos po med pa yin la /
translated: and the object of inference is not a non-thing.

original: dngos po yang ma bzung ba de'i phyir ji ltar thob par 'gyur /
analyzed: dngos po yang ma bzung ba de'i phyir ji ltar thob par 'gyur /
translated: Since a thing is not apprehended, how can it be obtained?

original: de'i phyir tha snyad du bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / skad cig ma nyid kyis thob pa'i dus na rjes su 'jug pa med pa'i phyir gzung ba ma nges pa'i thob par byed pa ni mngon sum ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha snyad du bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / skad cig ma nyid kyis thob pa'i dus na rjes su 'jug pa med pa'i phyir gzung ba ma nges pa'i thob par byed pa ni mngon sum ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it is not conventionally a function, and because at the time of obtaining it, there is no subsequent engagement, direct perception is not able to obtain its object.

original: dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa yang gzung ba'i thob par byed pa ma yin no //🔽gang zhig yul dang dus dang rnam pa @224a * //
analyzed: dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa yang gzung ba'i thob par byed pa ma yin no // gang zhig yul dang dus dang rnam pa @224a * //
translated: And because it is not a thing, inference also is not able to obtain its object.

original: nges par byas pa tha snyad du nus pa de 'jug pa'i yul du 'gyur ba thob par nus pa yin no //
analyzed: nges par byas pa tha snyad du nus pa de 'jug pa'i yul du 'gyur ba thob par nus pa yin no //
translated: That which is able to ascertain an object in terms of place, time, and aspect is able to engage its object and obtain it.

original: mngon sum gyi gzung ba ni skad cig gcig gi cha shas dngos po'i rgyu na nges par byed la /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi gzung ba ni skad cig gcig gi cha shas dngos po'i rgyu na nges par byed la /
translated: Direct perception ascertains the part of a single moment of an object that is a thing,

original: de yang skad cig brgyud pa dpag tu med pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir thob pa'i dus rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir thob par nus pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang skad cig brgyud pa dpag tu med pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir thob pa'i dus rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir thob par nus pa yin no //
translated: and because that is the nature of an immeasurable continuum of moments, it is able to obtain it by subsequent engagement.

original: rjes su dpag pas kyang gal te yang bzung ba gang yin pa de dngos po ma yin pa de lta na yang de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las 'dogs par sgro btags pas phyi rol nyid du sgro btags pas na nges par phyi rol nges par 'gyur ba
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas kyang gal te yang bzung ba gang yin pa de dngos po ma yin pa de lta na yang de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las 'dogs par sgro btags pas phyi rol nyid du sgro btags pas na nges par phyi rol nges par 'gyur ba
translated: Also, if one infers, then even if what is apprehended is not an entity, still, since it is imputed to be the nature of that which is not its nature, it is imputed to be external.

original: yin la / de yang 'jug pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir thob par nus pa yin no //
analyzed: yin la / de yang 'jug pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir thob par nus pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is definitely external, and since it is the object of engagement, it is possible to obtain it.

original: de'i phyir tshad ma ni gzung ba thob par byed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshad ma ni gzung ba thob par byed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, valid knowledge does not obtain the object that is apprehended.

original: 'on kyang nges pa thob par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang nges pa thob par byed pa yin no //
translated: However, it does obtain ascertainment.

original: des na ston par byed pa ni zhen pa yin gyi 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na ston par byed pa ni zhen pa yin gyi 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore the object that is taught is the object of apprehension, not the object of grasping.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: Thus it is said:🔽The object of apprehension is explained to be a different object, a different object that is a division of the object, but it is not a different object of the function of valid knowledge.

original: gzung ba'i yul tha dad pa don gyi dbye ba bshad kyi tshad ma'i bya ba'i yul tha dad pa ni ma yin no zhes bshad pa dang / thob pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba'i zhen par byed pa ni tshad ma'i bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: gzung ba'i yul tha dad pa don gyi dbye ba bshad kyi tshad ma'i bya ba'i yul tha dad pa ni ma yin no zhes bshad pa dang / thob pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba'i zhen par byed pa ni tshad ma'i bya ba yin gyi /
translated: The function of valid knowledge is to cause ascertainment, which is a part of obtaining.

original: 'dzin pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / zhen par byas pa thob par byed pa tshad ma yin par nges par bzung nas dngos po'i yul can tshad ma nyid ces bya ba dang / 'di gnyis kyi don yongs su bcad nas zhes kyang bshad do //
analyzed: 'dzin pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / zhen par byas pa thob par byed pa tshad ma yin par nges par bzung nas dngos po'i yul can tshad ma nyid ces bya ba dang / 'di gnyis kyi don yongs su bcad nas zhes kyang bshad do //
translated: And it is also said that having ascertained the object of these two.

original: yongs su bcad pa ni zhen pa yin gyi bzung ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yongs su bcad pa ni zhen pa yin gyi bzung ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Ascertainment is grasping, but not apprehension.

original: bsam pa la ni slu med phyir /
analyzed: bsam pa la ni slu med phyir /
translated: Because the intention is nondeceptive,

original: 'khrul ba yin yang tshad ma nyid //
analyzed: 'khrul ba yin yang tshad ma nyid //
translated: it is valid cognition even though it is mistaken.

original: ces gang bshad pa bsam pa ni mngon par 'dod par bya ba ste /
analyzed: ces gang bshad pa bsam pa ni mngon par 'dod par bya ba ste /
translated: As for what was explained, “The intention is the object of desire,

original: zhen pa nyid la brjod do //
analyzed: zhen pa nyid la brjod do //
translated: it is said to be grasping.

original: de lta na yang zhen par byas pa'i thob pa ni mi slu ba yin no //🔽gang gi phyir zhen pa nyid tshad ma'i bya ba yin pa de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni gdon mi za bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang zhen par byas pa'i thob pa ni mi slu ba yin no // gang gi phyir zhen pa nyid tshad ma'i bya ba yin pa de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni gdon mi za bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Even though it is like that, the attainment of the object of grasping is nondeceptive.🔽Because grasping itself is the function of valid cognition, it is definitely the function.

original: gang byas pas shes pa tshad mar 'gyur ba de ni gdon mi za bar bya ba yin la /
analyzed: gang byas pas shes pa tshad mar 'gyur ba de ni gdon mi za bar bya ba yin la /
translated: That which causes the knowledge to become valid cognition is definitely the function.

original: de gdon mi za bar bya ba gang yin pa de yang 'bras bur brjod do //
analyzed: de gdon mi za bar bya ba gang yin pa de yang 'bras bur brjod do //
translated: That which is to be done without fail is also called the result.

original: de nyid kyi phyir tshad ma ni zhen par byas pa'i 'bras bu can yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir tshad ma ni zhen par byas pa'i 'bras bu can yin no //
translated: Therefore, a means of valid knowledge has a result that is ascertained.

original: tshad ma nges pa'i 'bras bu can zhes gang bshad pa la nges pa zhes bya ba ni gtan la 'bebs pa ste zhen pa la brjod do //
analyzed: tshad ma nges pa'i 'bras bu can zhes gang bshad pa la nges pa zhes bya ba ni gtan la 'bebs pa ste zhen pa la brjod do //
translated: As for what was said, “a means of valid knowledge has a result that is ascertained,” “ascertained” means determined, that is, ascertained.🔽Ascertainment in this context is said to be a component of attainment.

original: 'di la zhen pa ni thob pa'i yan lag la brjod do zhes @224b 'jug pa'i 'bras bu can zhes kyang gsungs te /🔽'jug pa'i yan lag tu gyur bas na thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa ni tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di la zhen pa ni thob pa'i yan lag la brjod do zhes @224b 'jug pa'i 'bras bu can zhes kyang gsungs te / 'jug pa'i yan lag tu gyur bas na thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa ni tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is also said to have a result that is engaged,🔽because it is a component of engagement. The ascertainment that is a component of attainment is a means of valid knowledge. This is the meaning.

original: gang gi phyir 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pas thob pa'i yan lag zhen pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir tshad ma ni ma rtogs pa'i yul can yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pas thob pa'i yan lag zhen pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir tshad ma ni ma rtogs pa'i yul can yin no //
translated: Because it is the cause of engagement, ascertainment is a component of attainment. Therefore, a means of valid knowledge has an object that is not understood.

original: gal te rtogs par byed pa las thob par byed pa gzhan yin na ni rtogs pa'i dngos po gang yin pa la shes pa gzhan yang thob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir rtogs zin pa'i yul can yang tshad mar 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te rtogs par byed pa las thob par byed pa gzhan yin na ni rtogs pa'i dngos po gang yin pa la shes pa gzhan yang thob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir rtogs zin pa'i yul can yang tshad mar 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: If that which obtains is different from that which comprehends, then any consciousness that is the object of comprehension would also be that which obtains, and thus the subject that has already comprehended its object would be valid knowledge.

original: gang gi phyir zhen pa nyid thob par byed pa yin pa de'i phyir gang gi dngos po de rtogs pa de nyid kyi skyes bu bcug cing don thob par byed pa de'i phyir gnyis pa'am gsum pa gzhan la snga ma med pa'i thob par byed pa nyid med🔽pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhen pa nyid thob par byed pa yin pa de'i phyir gang gi dngos po de rtogs pa de nyid kyi skyes bu bcug cing don thob par byed pa de'i phyir gnyis pa'am gsum pa gzhan la snga ma med pa'i thob par byed pa nyid med pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: But because that which comprehends is that which obtains, therefore the person who comprehends that object is engaged and obtains the object. Therefore, the second or third moment is not valid knowledge because it does not obtain what was not previously obtained.

original: gal te thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa tshad ma'i bya ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa tshad ma'i bya ba yin na /
translated: If the obtaining of the object is the function of valid knowledge,

original: 'o na ni mngon sum tshad mar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ni mngon sum tshad mar mi 'gyur te /
translated: then direct perception would not be valid knowledge,

original: gang gi phyir de la ni tshad ma'i bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de la ni tshad ma'i bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not have the function of valid knowledge.

original: ci ste mngon sum las sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba ni de'i bya ba yin no snyam na /
analyzed: ci ste mngon sum las sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba ni de'i bya ba yin no snyam na /
translated: But if you think that the function of direct perception is to generate the conceptual thought that affirms or denies,

original: de lta na ni 'o na tshad ma las bya ba tha dad par 'gyur na de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na tshad ma las bya ba tha dad par 'gyur na de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: then in that case, direct perception would be different from its function, but that is not logical.

original: gzhan yang bya ba nyid ni 'bras bu yin la de lta na yang 'bras bu tha dad par smra ba yongs su gzung ba mi 'dod par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang bya ba nyid ni 'bras bu yin la de lta na yang 'bras bu tha dad par smra ba yongs su gzung ba mi 'dod par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, the function itself is the result, and in that case, it would follow that you do not accept that the result is different from the cause.

original: gal te de lta na mngon sum zhes bya ba 'di ni shin tu chung bar smra ba yin te /
analyzed: gal te de lta na mngon sum zhes bya ba 'di ni shin tu chung bar smra ba yin te /
translated: But if you say that, then this so-called direct perception is a very small thing.

original: rjes su dpag pa yang tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa yang tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Inference would not be a valid means of knowledge.

original: gang gi phyir tshad ma'i bya ba ni thob pa'i yan lag tu gyur ba'i zhes pa yin la rjes su dpag pa ni skad cig las phan chad du mi gnas pas de'i bdag nyid du gyur ba'i zhen pa ldog pa na rjes su dpag pa la thob pa'i
analyzed: gang gi phyir tshad ma'i bya ba ni thob pa'i yan lag tu gyur ba'i zhes pa yin la rjes su dpag pa ni skad cig las phan chad du mi gnas pas de'i bdag nyid du gyur ba'i zhen pa ldog pa na rjes su dpag pa la thob pa'i
translated: Because the function of valid knowledge is to obtain the result, and since inference does not remain for more than an instant, when the conception that is its nature ceases, the result of obtaining the object is not possible.

original: yan lag gi zhen pa srid par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: yan lag gi zhen pa srid par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How could there be attachment to the parts in the case of existence?

original: ji ste rjes su dpag pa las gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa skye ba na gang gis thob par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ji ste rjes su dpag pa las gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa skye ba na gang gis thob par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that when a conceptual thought arises from inference, it is valid cognition,

original: de lta na ni 'o na thob pa'i de ma thag pa'i mthar thug pa'i rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'i tshogs tshad mar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na thob pa'i de ma thag pa'i mthar thug pa'i rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'i tshogs tshad mar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: then the collection of inferences, etc., that immediately precede the attainment of valid cognition would be valid cognition.

original: yang na thob pa'i de ma thag pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'ba' zhig tshad mar 'gyur gyi rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin par 'gyur ro //🔽'dis ni mngon sum rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yang @225a * //
analyzed: yang na thob pa'i de ma thag pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'ba' zhig tshad mar 'gyur gyi rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin par 'gyur ro // 'dis ni mngon sum rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yang @225a * //
translated: Or else, only the conceptual thought that immediately precedes the attainment of valid cognition would be valid cognition, and inference would not be.

original: bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa yin no //
translated: This also explains that perception is conceptual.

original: de'i phyir 'dir ni 'di ltar rnam par gnas te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir ni 'di ltar rnam par gnas te /
translated: Therefore, the matter is to be determined in this way:

original: chos can la khyab par bya ba shes pa na khyab par byed pa gdon mi za bar nges pa ni rjes su dpag bas bya ba yin la rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyi bya ba ni spyod pa tsam yin no //
analyzed: chos can la khyab par bya ba shes pa na khyab par byed pa gdon mi za bar nges pa ni rjes su dpag bas bya ba yin la rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyi bya ba ni spyod pa tsam yin no //
translated: When one knows the pervasion of the subject, it is inference that ascertains the presence of the probandum without doubt. The function of other conceptual thoughts is merely to engage the object.

original: 'di ltar dbang po'i rnam par shes pa mtha' dag 'gags pa na rnam par dpyod pa de'i tshe bdag ni rnam par dpyod par byed kyi mthong ba'am chos can la khyab par bya ba mthong bas 'brel ba can gyi chos can chos gzhan la nges par rtogs pa
analyzed: 'di ltar dbang po'i rnam par shes pa mtha' dag 'gags pa na rnam par dpyod pa de'i tshe bdag ni rnam par dpyod par byed kyi mthong ba'am chos can la khyab par bya ba mthong bas 'brel ba can gyi chos can chos gzhan la nges par rtogs pa
translated: Thus, when all the sense consciousnesses have ceased, at that time, the self is the one who analyzes, not the one who sees. The one who sees is the subject, which is related to the object, and the object is ascertained by another cognition.

original: ni ma yin no zhes nyams su myong ba las rnam par rtog pa'i bya ba ni dpyod pa tsam yin no zhes nges so //
analyzed: ni ma yin no zhes nyams su myong ba las rnam par rtog pa'i bya ba ni dpyod pa tsam yin no zhes nges so //
translated: From this experience, we ascertain that the activity of conceptual cognition is mere analysis.

original: de na 'di dag gi rang gi byed pa las blo lhag par snang ba gang yin pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las shes pa gzhan gyis byas pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de na 'di dag gi rang gi byed pa las blo lhag par snang ba gang yin pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las shes pa gzhan gyis byas pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, whatever appears to the mind as something more than its own activity is seen by another cognition that is either concomitant or subsequent.

original: bdag gis mthong ngo zhes mthong ba nyid du nges pa yang rtog pa la bla lhag pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag gis mthong ngo zhes mthong ba nyid du nges pa yang rtog pa la bla lhag pa yin no //
translated: The ascertainment that “I see” is also more prominent in conceptual cognition.

original: rnam par rtog pas ni don de mthong ba ma yin gyi 'on kyang dpyod pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas ni don de mthong ba ma yin gyi 'on kyang dpyod pa yin no //
translated: Conceptual cognition does not see that object, but rather analyzes it.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rnam par rtog pa lta ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa gang ji snyed pa de thams cad ni 'du byed ma nyams pa can gyi mthong ba rab tu ston pa'i tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnam par rtog pa lta ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa gang ji snyed pa de thams cad ni 'du byed ma nyams pa can gyi mthong ba rab tu ston pa'i tshad ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, all that is associated with the activity of seeing, which is conceptual, is a valid cognition that reveals the seeing of one whose formative factors are unimpaired.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i ji snyed pa de la ni 'du byed pa nyams pa med pa can gyi rjes su dpag pa tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i ji snyed pa de la ni 'du byed pa nyams pa med pa can gyi rjes su dpag pa tshad ma yin no //
translated: And all that is associated with the activity of inferring is a valid inference for one whose formative factors are unimpaired.

original: des na thob par byed pa ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: des na thob par byed pa ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, direct perception and inference are the means of acquiring knowledge.

original: de lta na dper na rjes su dpag pa rang gi bya ba thob pa dang mthun pa'i nges par byed pa nyid rtog pa gzhan dang gzhan la 'jog pa de bzhin du mngon sum la yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta na dper na rjes su dpag pa rang gi bya ba thob pa dang mthun pa'i nges par byed pa nyid rtog pa gzhan dang gzhan la 'jog pa de bzhin du mngon sum la yang shes par bya'o //
translated: Just as inference is the means of acquiring knowledge that is consistent with the acquisition of its own object, and just as it is posited in relation to other conceptual thoughts, so too should direct perception be understood.

original: 'di ni rig @225b pa yang yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni rig @225b pa yang yin te /
translated: This is also known.

original: gang gi phyir 'jug pa'i yul ston par byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshad ma yin la 'jug pa'i yul ston par byed pa gang yang 'jug pa'i yul bstan par shes pa de nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'jug pa'i yul ston par byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshad ma yin la 'jug pa'i yul ston par byed pa gang yang 'jug pa'i yul bstan par shes pa de nyid yin no //
translated: Because whatever reveals the object of engagement is a valid cognition, and whatever reveals the object of engagement is the cognition that knows the object of engagement.

original: de bzhin du gang bstan pa ni 'jug pa'i yin zhing bstan pa ni gang bstan par shes pa de yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gang bstan pa ni 'jug pa'i yin zhing bstan pa ni gang bstan par shes pa de yin no //
translated: Similarly, whatever is revealed is the object of engagement, and whatever is revealed is the cognition that knows the object of engagement.

original: gang zhig bstan par mi shes pa de ni gzung du zin kyang ma bzung ba dang 'dra ba'i skad cig ma nyid bzhin du 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig bstan par mi shes pa de ni gzung du zin kyang ma bzung ba dang 'dra ba'i skad cig ma nyid bzhin du 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is not known to be revealed is not the object of engagement, even if apprehended, like a momentary object not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du ston par byed pa ni ston par byed pa nyid du ma shes pa gang yin pa de yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du ston par byed pa ni ston par byed pa nyid du ma shes pa gang yin pa de yin la /
translated: Similarly, whatever is not known to be revealing is revealing.

original: ston par byed pa nyid du ma shes pa gang yin pa de ni yod du zin kyang gsal bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ston par byed pa nyid du ma shes pa gang yin pa de ni yod du zin kyang gsal bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is not known to be revealing is not clarifying, even if existent.

original: de ltar na yang mngon sum la brten pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la ston par byed pa ni mngon sum nyid yin gyi rnam par rtog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na yang mngon sum la brten pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la ston par byed pa ni mngon sum nyid yin gyi rnam par rtog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the teaching of the conceptual thoughts that are based on perception is perception itself, not conceptual thought.

original: gang gi phyir de ni dngos po mthong ba nyid du rnam par rtog gi rnam par dpyod pa nyid du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ni dngos po mthong ba nyid du rnam par rtog gi rnam par dpyod pa nyid du ni ma yin no //
translated: Because that conceptual thought is a thought that sees an entity, not a thought that analyzes.

original: mthong ba yang mngon sum gyi byed pa yin pa de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa rnams la ston par byed pa ni mngon sum yin gyi rnam par rtog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba yang mngon sum gyi byed pa yin pa de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa rnams la ston par byed pa ni mngon sum yin gyi rnam par rtog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: And seeing is the activity of perception. Therefore, the teaching of the conceptual thoughts is perception, not conceptual thought.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mngon sum ni zhen pa skyed par byed pas yul nges par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mngon sum ni zhen pa skyed par byed pas yul nges par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: For this very reason, perception does not determine the object by producing a conception.

original: 'on kyang rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba sngar gyi mngon sum de nyid nges pa'i bdag tu skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba sngar gyi mngon sum de nyid nges pa'i bdag tu skyes pa yin no //
translated: But the conceptual thought that arises is born from the perception that has already arisen.

original: gang gi phyir rnam par rtog pa ni de'i tshe dngos po mthong bar zhen pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam par rtog pa ni de'i tshe dngos po mthong bar zhen pa yin no //
translated: Because the conceptual thought is a conception that sees the entity at that time.

original: des na sngar gyi lta ba nyid zhen par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: des na sngar gyi lta ba nyid zhen par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, the former view is the grasping.

original: rnam par rtog pa la rang gi bya ba thob pa'i yan lag 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la rang gi bya ba thob pa'i yan lag 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the grasping is the part that obtains its own activity.

original: zhen pa yang lta ba nyid du gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: zhen pa yang lta ba nyid du gyur pa yin te /
translated: And the grasping is the view itself,

original: rang gi bya ba dpyod pa spangs nas lta ba'i bya ba mthong ba 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi bya ba dpyod pa spangs nas lta ba'i bya ba mthong ba 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it abandons the activity of analysis and holds the activity of seeing the object.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum ni rnam par rtog pa'i shing rta la zhon nas nges par byed par shes par bya'i rang nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir nges par byed par byed pa ni ma yin no// zhen pa'i ston par byed pa ni mngon sum yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum ni rnam par rtog pa'i shing rta la zhon nas nges par byed par shes par bya'i rang nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir nges par byed par byed pa ni ma yin no// zhen pa'i ston par byed pa ni mngon sum yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that direct perception ascertains having mounted the chariot of conceptuality, but it does not ascertain by itself because it is nonconceptual.🔽The teacher of the grasping is direct perception,

original: rnam par rtog pa ni mngon sum las logs su ni nges par byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni mngon sum las logs su ni nges par byed pa ma yin la /
translated: but conceptuality does not ascertain apart from direct perception.

original: mngon sum zhen pa'i bdag nyid kyis zhen par byed pa yin par mi lta'i 'on kyang sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: mngon sum zhen pa'i bdag nyid kyis zhen par byed pa yin par mi lta'i 'on kyang sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: And direct perception does not ascertain by the nature of grasping, but rather by the method explained earlier.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum nyid thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir thob @226a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum nyid thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir thob @226a * //
translated: Therefore, since the nature of the obtainment of direct perception is the obtainment of the limbs, it is not tenable that it is the obtainment of the object.🔽

original: par bya ba 'jug pa'i yul gyi ston par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: par bya ba 'jug pa'i yul gyi ston par byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it is the nature of the apprehension of the means of attaining perception, it is the revealer of the object to be attained, which is the domain of engagement.

original: de bzhin du rjes su dpag pa yang rnam par rtog pa gzhan la 'jog pas thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir thob par bya ba'i thob par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rjes su dpag pa yang rnam par rtog pa gzhan la 'jog pas thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir thob par bya ba'i thob par byed pa yin no //
translated: Similarly, since inference is the nature of the apprehension of the means of attaining the other conceptualization, it is the revealer of the object to be attained.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pas byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pas byas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the conceptualization that possesses the activity of perception and inference is produced by perception and inference.

original: 'dir de kho na nyid 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir de kho na nyid 'di yin te /
translated: Here is the truth of the matter:

original: rnam par rtog pa ni tshad ma'i bya ba 'jug pa'i yul ston pa'i byed mkhan ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang tha snyad byed pa po yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni tshad ma'i bya ba 'jug pa'i yul ston pa'i byed mkhan ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang tha snyad byed pa po yin no //
translated: Conceptualization is not the revealer of the domain of engagement of the activity of valid cognition, but rather it is the user of conventions.

original: ston par byed pa 'di'i sgo nas tha snyad du byed pa'i ston pa po mngon sum mam rjes su dpag pa de gang yin pa de yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ston par byed pa 'di'i sgo nas tha snyad du byed pa'i ston pa po mngon sum mam rjes su dpag pa de gang yin pa de yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: The teacher is the one who teaches by means of this, and he is either a direct perceiver or an inferential cognizer of that which is being taught, but not anything else.

original: gzhal bya ni sngon po'i sngon po nyid la sogs pa tha dad du byas pa'i cha gang yin pa de kho na nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhal bya ni sngon po'i sngon po nyid la sogs pa tha dad du byas pa'i cha gang yin pa de kho na nyid yin gyi /
translated: The object of comprehension is just that aspect which is differentiated as the blueness of blue, etc.

original: gzhan tha dad du ma byas pa'i skad cig nyid la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan tha dad du ma byas pa'i skad cig nyid la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the momentariness, etc., which is not differentiated as something else.

original: tha snyad du ma byas pa ni yod kyang med pa dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad du ma byas pa ni yod kyang med pa dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, although it exists, it is not differentiated conventionally, it is no different from what does not exist.

original: de ltar mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa ni thob par byed pa'i yan lag gi zhen par byed pa yin pas bstan pa thob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa ni thob par byed pa'i yan lag gi zhen par byed pa yin pas bstan pa thob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no //
translated: Thus, direct perception and inference are the means of achieving the object of comprehension, and since they cause one to achieve the teaching, they are valid cognitions.

original: gal te don thob par nus pa'i tshad mar brjod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te don thob par nus pa'i tshad mar brjod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But is it not said that a valid cognition is that which is able to bring about the attainment of the object?

original: bden te don de ni rab tu bstan pa nyid thob par byed pa bzhin yin gyi 'ba' zhig la ni ma yin la tshad ma'i thob par byed pa nyid kyang thob pa'i nus pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: bden te don de ni rab tu bstan pa nyid thob par byed pa bzhin yin gyi 'ba' zhig la ni ma yin la tshad ma'i thob par byed pa nyid kyang thob pa'i nus pa nyid yin no //
translated: True, but this is like the case of the word “obtain” itself, which is the means of obtaining the object that is taught, but not the only means. And the means of obtaining a valid cognition is the capacity to obtain it.

original: des na bstan pa thob par byed pa'i sgra ni thob par nus pa gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na bstan pa thob par byed pa'i sgra ni thob par nus pa gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word “obtain” that is used in the expression “obtain the object” makes known the capacity to obtain.

original: thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni shes pa thob par nus pa yin gyi /
analyzed: thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni shes pa thob par nus pa yin gyi /
translated: The “obtain” in “obtain the object” is the capacity to know the object, not its being already obtained.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: Otherwise, it would not be the capacity to obtain the object.

original: de'i phyir thob pa'i yan lag gis zhen pa'i rang bzhin nyid don thob pa'i nus pa yin pa'i phyir nus pa zhes bya bas thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa nyid kyi don bstan pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir thob pa'i yan lag gis zhen pa'i rang bzhin nyid don thob pa'i nus pa yin pa'i phyir nus pa zhes bya bas thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa nyid kyi don bstan pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the “obtain” in “obtain the object” is the capacity to obtain the object, and the word “capacity” indicates the “obtain” in “obtain the object” as having the nature of the capacity to obtain the object, but not anything else.

original: gang yang don med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir tshad ma zhes brjod pa de la don 'di yin te /
analyzed: gang yang don med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir tshad ma zhes brjod pa de la don 'di yin te /
translated: Now, suppose someone argued as follows: Since it does not occur if the object does not exist, it is called a valid cognition. What is the meaning of this?

original: shes pa'i don thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa'i don gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: shes pa'i don thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa'i don gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: because it is the result of the branch of obtaining the object.

original: don gyi 'bras bu ma yin pa de la ni thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa med do zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: don gyi 'bras bu ma yin pa de la ni thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa med do zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: That which is not the result of the object does not have the branch of obtaining.

original: ci ste 'di dag las gzhan pa'i @226b shes pa ji ltar thob par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste 'di dag las gzhan pa'i @226b shes pa ji ltar thob par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: But how can it be the branch of obtaining if it is different from these?

original: nyon cig gang yul thob par nus pa de ni thob par byed pa'i yan gal yin la /
analyzed: nyon cig gang yul thob par nus pa de ni thob par byed pa'i yan gal yin la /
translated: Listen! That which is able to obtain the object is the branch of obtaining.

original: gzhan ni thob par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni thob par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: But the others are not able to obtain it.

original: re zhig log pa'i shes pa ni bstan pa thob par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig log pa'i shes pa ni bstan pa thob par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: First, wrong knowledge is not able to obtain the object that is taught,

original: dngos po med pas thob par nus pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pas thob par nus pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not able to obtain a nonexistent object.

original: dngos po yin na yang log pa'i shes pa nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po yin na yang log pa'i shes pa nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And even if it were an existent object, it would not be tenable as wrong knowledge.

original: the tshom yang yod pa'am med pa ma nges par dngos po 'jog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: the tshom yang yod pa'am med pa ma nges par dngos po 'jog par byed pa yin no //
translated: Doubt also establishes an object as either existent or nonexistent, but it is not certain.

original: ma nges pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ma nges pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And the uncertain is not existent.

original: dngos po ni yod pa nyid du nges ba'am /
analyzed: dngos po ni yod pa nyid du nges ba'am /
translated: Things are ascertained as existent,

original: med pa ma yin gyi yod pa dang med pa ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: med pa ma yin gyi yod pa dang med pa ma nges pa yin no //
translated: or they are not ascertained as either existent or nonexistent.

original: de'i phyir the tshom ni thob par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir the tshom ni thob par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, doubt does not cause attainment.

original: gang yang khung na chu yod do zhes gcig tu nges pa ni dngos po'i rang bzhin snang ba ma yin la /
analyzed: gang yang khung na chu yod do zhes gcig tu nges pa ni dngos po'i rang bzhin snang ba ma yin la /
translated: Moreover, when someone says, “There is water in the well,” the nature of the thing is not evident.

original: med na mi 'byung ba mthong ba'i rgyu mtshan yang ma yin te /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba mthong ba'i rgyu mtshan yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there a reason to see that it is not nonexistent.

original: des na nges par 'jog pa'i nus pa med pas de ni the tshom nyid do ;
analyzed: des na nges par 'jog pa'i nus pa med pas de ni the tshom nyid do ;
translated: Therefore, since there is no ability to ascertain, that is doubt itself.

analyzed: / gang gi phyir de ni bdag gis dngos po'i rang bzhin nam de dang 'brel pa mthong ba ni ma yin no zhes ma rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not that one does not understand, “I have not seen the nature of the thing or its connection.”

translated: When one does not see either the thing or its connection, and there is a part that is not ascertained, that ascertainment is itself not ascertained. Therefore, it is only doubt.

translated: One does not know the nature of smoke, and one does not know the nature of fire.🔽One does not know the nature of smoke, and one does not know the nature of fire.🔽One does not know the nature of smoke, and one does not know the nature of fire.🔽One does not know the nature of smoke, and one does not know the nature of fire.🔽One does not know the nature of smoke, and one does not know the nature of fire.

analyzed: rang bzhin nges pa med pa'i du ba sngon du song ba'i mi shes pa ni the tshom yin pa'i phyir thob par byed pa ma yin no // rjes su dpag pa ni 'brel ba'i dngos po mthong ba yod pa'am med pa'i dngos po nges par 'jog pa'i phyir thob par byed pa yin la / mngon sum yang snang ba'i rang bzhin nges pa 'jog pas thob par byed pa yin no //

original: lag te bdag cag mngon sum la the tshom skyes so zhen bden te /
analyzed: lag te bdag cag mngon sum la the tshom skyes so zhen bden te /
translated: One does not know the nature of smoke, and one does not know the nature of fire.

original: mngon sum la snang ba'i don 'di yang dag pa yin nam 'on te ma yin snyam du the tshom za'o //
analyzed: mngon sum la snang ba'i don 'di yang dag pa yin nam 'on te ma yin snyam du the tshom za'o //
translated: One doubts whether the object that appears to perception is real or not.

original: 'di snang ngam mi snang snyam du ni ma yin te /🔽de la ni snang ba me nyid du 'jog par byed pas mngon sum 'jug pa'i yul du @227a * //
analyzed: 'di snang ngam mi snang snyam du ni ma yin te / de la ni snang ba me nyid du 'jog par byed pas mngon sum 'jug pa'i yul du @227a * //
translated: One does not doubt whether it appears or not.

original: med pa yin no //
analyzed: med pa yin no //
translated: For, in that case, it is already established as fire, and so it is not the object of the engagement of perception.

original: phyis kyi yang dag pa'i don gyi yul can gyi the tshom za bas ni mngon sum gyi bya ba mi gnod do //
analyzed: phyis kyi yang dag pa'i don gyi yul can gyi the tshom za bas ni mngon sum gyi bya ba mi gnod do //
translated: The doubt of a later cognition that has a real object does not undermine the operation of perception.

original: mngon sum gyi bya ba ni nges par snang ba la zhe na par byed pa yin la de yang des byas pa'i phyir de la the tshom gyis ci byar yod /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi bya ba ni nges par snang ba la zhe na par byed pa yin la de yang des byas pa'i phyir de la the tshom gyis ci byar yod /
translated: The operation of perception is the ascertainment of the appearance, and that is done by it, so what can doubt do to it?

original: snang ba ni don snang bar nges par ma nges par mi snang ste /
analyzed: snang ba ni don snang bar nges par ma nges par mi snang ste /
translated: An appearance does not appear as uncertain, as not ascertained as the appearance of an object.

original: des na rnam par rtog pa the tshom gyi yul la ltos sam /
analyzed: des na rnam par rtog pa the tshom gyi yul la ltos sam /
translated: Therefore, conceptual doubt does not rely on the object of perception.

original: ma nges pa mngon sum gyi don ma yin no //
analyzed: ma nges pa mngon sum gyi don ma yin no //
translated: An uncertain perception is not the object of perception.

original: nges pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i don yin la snang ba ni mngon sum gyi don yin no //
analyzed: nges pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i don yin la snang ba ni mngon sum gyi don yin no //
translated: “Determination” is the meaning of “conceptualization,” and “appearance” is the meaning of “perception.”

original: bar ti ka las mngon sum gyi don snang ba'i dbang gis rnam par gzhag pa yin la rnam par rtog pa ni zhen pas so zhe na /
analyzed: bar ti ka las mngon sum gyi don snang ba'i dbang gis rnam par gzhag pa yin la rnam par rtog pa ni zhen pas so zhe na /
translated: The Vārtika says that perception is established on the basis of appearance, and conceptualization is on the basis of determination.

original: gang du phyin ci log tu nges par byas pa de la ni mngon sum tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: gang du phyin ci log tu nges par byas pa de la ni mngon sum tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: But if one determines something in error, that is not a valid cognition of perception.

original: dper na chung nges par byed pa ni smig rgyu'i rang gi mtshan nyid du 'dzin pa mngon sum tshad ma ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na chung nges par byed pa ni smig rgyu'i rang gi mtshan nyid du 'dzin pa mngon sum tshad ma ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, when one determines water in a mirage, the apprehension of the particular characteristic of a mirage is not a valid cognition of perception.

original: gang gi phyir 'jug pa'i yul ni nges pa yin la chu yang nges pa yin na de mi 'thob bo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'jug pa'i yul ni nges pa yin la chu yang nges pa yin na de mi 'thob bo //
translated: Because the object of engagement is determined, and water is determined, but it is not obtained.

original: smig rgyu'i rang gi mtshan nyid ni mngon sum gyis ma nges pa des na de ni 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa de'i phyir dbang po la brten pa'o //
analyzed: smig rgyu'i rang gi mtshan nyid ni mngon sum gyis ma nges pa des na de ni 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa de'i phyir dbang po la brten pa'o //
translated: The particular characteristic of a mirage is not determined by perception, therefore it is not the object of engagement. For that reason, it is based on the sense faculty.

original: phyin ci log gi zhen pa'i bzung ba yin la rjes su mthun pa'i zhen pas gnod pa tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la ci zhig the tshom za /
analyzed: phyin ci log gi zhen pa'i bzung ba yin la rjes su mthun pa'i zhen pas gnod pa tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la ci zhig the tshom za /
translated: What doubt can there be about the fact that the object of erroneous adherence is invalidated by the adherence that is in conformity with reality?

original: gang yang de lta na the tshom gyis zin pa'i mngon sum skyes pa de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: gang yang de lta na the tshom gyis zin pa'i mngon sum skyes pa de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: But what about the case of a perception that is accompanied by doubt?

original: de yang tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang tshad ma yin no //
translated: That is a valid cognition.

original: gang gi phyir 'di me 'am me tog gi tshogs yin /🔽yang dag pa'am yang dag pa ma yin zhes khyad par ram /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di me 'am me tog gi tshogs yin / yang dag pa'am yang dag pa ma yin zhes khyad par ram /
translated: Because it is a doubt about whether it is fire or a collection of flowers,🔽or whether it is real or unreal,

original: dngos po dang dngos po ma yin pa la the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po ma yin pa la the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: or whether it is an entity or a nonentity.

original: de la me nyid du ma zhen na ni gnyis la dmigs pa'i the tshom nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la me nyid du ma zhen na ni gnyis la dmigs pa'i the tshom nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If one is not attached to the idea that it is fire, then it is not a doubt that has two objects.

original: me nyid du zhen na ni the tshom gyis byas pa cha gzhan zhen pa mngon sum gyi bya ba las bla lhag pa yin pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi bya ba la gnod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: me nyid du zhen na ni the tshom gyis byas pa cha gzhan zhen pa mngon sum gyi bya ba las bla lhag pa yin pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi bya ba la gnod pa ma yin no //
translated: But if one is attached to the idea that it is fire, then the doubt does not invalidate the function of perception, because the function of perception is surpassed by the function of the attachment to a different aspect.

original: 'di snyam du mngon sum gyi bya ba ni mtha' gcig tu nges pa yin no snyam na de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du mngon sum gyi bya ba ni mtha' gcig tu nges pa yin no snyam na de ni mi rigs te /
translated: If you think that the activity of perception is exclusively a matter of certainty, that is not reasonable.

original: 'jug pa'i yul ni mngon sum du snang ba yin gyi the tshom ni bzung ba ma yin la /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul ni mngon sum du snang ba yin gyi the tshom ni bzung ba ma yin la /
translated: The object of engagement is the appearance of perception, but doubt is not apprehended.

original: de yang nges pa yin gyi ma nges pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang nges pa yin gyi ma nges pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is certain, but not uncertain.

original: de nges par 'gyur ram nges pa'i zhen pas yul du byas kyang nges pa nyid du gnas pa des na de @227b la mtha' gcig tu nges par ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de nges par 'gyur ram nges pa'i zhen pas yul du byas kyang nges pa nyid du gnas pa des na de @227b la mtha' gcig tu nges par ci zhig bya /
translated: Even if it becomes certain or if it is taken as an object by the attachment to certainty, it still remains certain. What is the point of being certain about that?

original: gal te zhen pa'i snang ba 'jug pa'i yul yin na ni mtha' gcig tu nges pa nyid mngon sum gyi 'bras bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te zhen pa'i snang ba 'jug pa'i yul yin na ni mtha' gcig tu nges pa nyid mngon sum gyi 'bras bur 'gyur te /
translated: If the object of engagement is the appearance of attachment, then certainty would be the result of perception,

original: mtha' gcig tu ma nges pa'i zhen pa'i yul ni thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' gcig tu ma nges pa'i zhen pa'i yul ni thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not possible to attain an object of attachment that is not certain.

original: 'jug pa'i yul ni mngon sum gyi rnam pa yin te ;
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul ni mngon sum gyi rnam pa yin te ;
translated: The object of engagement is the aspect of perception,

original: gang gi phyir de mthong bar zhen pa yin gyi spyod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de mthong bar zhen pa yin gyi spyod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: because it is seen with attachment, but not with conduct.

original: mthong ba yang mngon sum la gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba yang mngon sum la gnas pa yin te /
translated: And seeing is based on perception.

original: des na des mthong ba'i me de nyid nges pa yin pa'i phyir na 'jug pa'i yul yin no //
analyzed: des na des mthong ba'i me de nyid nges pa yin pa'i phyir na 'jug pa'i yul yin no //
translated: Therefore, since that very fire seen by it is ascertained, it is the object of engagement.

original: 'jug par byed pa'i mngon sum yin gyi the tshom ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jug par byed pa'i mngon sum yin gyi the tshom ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the engaging perception, not doubt.

original: de'i rnam par 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rnam par 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not the object of engagement of that.

original: gang yang the tshom gyi rnam pa gzhan sgro btags pa gang yin pa de ni tshad ma gzhan gyis sel par byed do //
analyzed: gang yang the tshom gyi rnam pa gzhan sgro btags pa gang yin pa de ni tshad ma gzhan gyis sel par byed do //
translated: And whatever other aspect of doubt is superimposed, that is eliminated by another valid cognition.

original: gal te 'jig rten the tshom las kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur na ni the tshom za na ldog par bya ba yin na gang gi phyir 'jug pa yin pa des na the tshom ldog par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te 'jig rten the tshom las kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur na ni the tshom za na ldog par bya ba yin na gang gi phyir 'jug pa yin pa des na the tshom ldog par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: If one did not engage even from doubt in the world, then when in doubt one would turn back. But since one does engage, therefore doubt does not turn one back.

original: 'gal ba'i rang bzhin du nges par byas pa mthong ba tsam ni rab tu bstan pa ma yin pa des na 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pas mngon sum 'jug par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i rang bzhin du nges par byas pa mthong ba tsam ni rab tu bstan pa ma yin pa des na 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pas mngon sum 'jug par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The mere seeing that ascertains the contradictory nature is not taught, therefore it is not the object of engagement. Thus perception does not engage.

original: de ltar na 'gal ba'i rang bzhin des na ni tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur gyi the tshom gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na 'gal ba'i rang bzhin des na ni tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur gyi the tshom gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, it is because of the nature of contradiction that it is not a means of valid cognition, not because of doubt.

original: des na 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa'i zhen pa la mtha' gcig par ci zhig bya /
analyzed: des na 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa'i zhen pa la mtha' gcig par ci zhig bya /
translated: So what is the point of insisting that it is not a means of valid cognition because it is not a means of engaging?
