original: gang du zhen pa nyid 'jug par byed pa der ni mtha' gcig pa nyid tshol ba yin te /
analyzed: gang du zhen pa nyid 'jug par byed pa der ni mtha' gcig pa nyid tshol ba yin te /
translated: Where there is a means of engaging, there is a means of valid cognition, because it is a means of seeking out what is one-sided.

original: dper na rjes su dpag pa bzhin no //🔽de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa la ni rjes su dpag pa tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: dper na rjes su dpag pa bzhin no // de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa la ni rjes su dpag pa tshad ma yin te /
translated: For example, inference is a means of valid cognition.

original: nges pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir dang / yul nges pa yod pa dang med pa yang thob par nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir dang / yul nges pa yod pa dang med pa yang thob par nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, conceptual thought is a means of valid cognition, because it has a definite object and because it is able to obtain the existence or nonexistence of a definite object.

original: gzhan yang mngon sum thams cad kyi 'jug pa'i yul ni snang zhing nges pa'i dngos po'i rgyun yin gyi rtags ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang mngon sum thams cad kyi 'jug pa'i yul ni snang zhing nges pa'i dngos po'i rgyun yin gyi rtags ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, the object of engagement of all direct perception is a continuum of things that appear and are ascertained, not a reason.

original: snang ba'i nges pa rnam par 'jog pa po yang mngon sum yin gyi zhen pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: snang ba'i nges pa rnam par 'jog pa po yang mngon sum yin gyi zhen pa ni ma yin no //
translated: And the ascertainment of what appears is direct perception, not conceptual thought.

original: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul nges pa'i rnam par 'jig pa po ni lta ba nyid yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul nges pa'i rnam par 'jig pa po ni lta ba nyid yin la /
translated: Therefore, the view is that which destroys the object of engagement by determining it.

original: ma nges par 'jog pa po ni the tshom zhes bya ba'i zhen pa yin gyi lta ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ma nges par 'jog pa po ni the tshom zhes bya ba'i zhen pa yin gyi lta ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Doubt is that which places the object of engagement without determining it. It is attachment, not the view.

original: gal te dngos po thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa mngon sum gyi bya bar brjod pa ma yin @228a * //
analyzed: gal te dngos po thob pa'i yan lag gi zhen pa mngon sum gyi bya bar brjod pa ma yin @228a * //
translated: If it is said that attachment to the limbs of obtaining a thing is not the activity of direct perception,

original: nam zhen bden te /
analyzed: nam zhen bden te /
translated: it is true that it is attachment.

original: mthong bar zhen pa yin gyi zhen pa tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong bar zhen pa yin gyi zhen pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is attachment to seeing, not mere attachment.

original: mngon sum gyi bya ba ni mthong bar zhen pa yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi bya ba ni mthong bar zhen pa yin te /
translated: The activity of direct perception is attachment to seeing.

original: ma zhen na ni skad cig ma nyid bzhin du yul dang dus dang rnam par nges pa tha snyad du bya bar mi nus pa'i dngos po 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: ma zhen na ni skad cig ma nyid bzhin du yul dang dus dang rnam par nges pa tha snyad du bya bar mi nus pa'i dngos po 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //
translated: If there were no attachment, then the object of engagement would not be a thing that can be engaged in conventionally, as determined by place, time, and aspect, just as with momentariness.

original: de ltar na the tshom gyis mthong ba nyid du nges na yang yul dang dus dang rnam par nges pa'i dngos po snang zhing des pa tha snyad du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na the tshom gyis mthong ba nyid du nges na yang yul dang dus dang rnam par nges pa'i dngos po snang zhing des pa tha snyad du byas pa yin no //
translated: Thus, even when seeing is determined by doubt, the thing appears as determined by place, time, and aspect, and it is conventionally engaged.

original: gal te the tshom gyis zhen par byas pa'i sngon po ma nges pa yin la gzhan du ni thob par nus pa'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul ni ma nges pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te the tshom gyis zhen par byas pa'i sngon po ma nges pa yin la gzhan du ni thob par nus pa'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul ni ma nges pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But if the object of engagement is not ascertained, since blue is ascertained by doubt, but not otherwise, how can it be ascertained?

original: de ltar ni bden na ma nges pa ni zhen par byas pa yin la snang ba ni ma nges pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar ni bden na ma nges pa ni zhen par byas pa yin la snang ba ni ma nges pa yin te /
translated: This is true, but the object of engagement is not ascertained by doubt, but by ascertainment.

original: des na snang ba nges pa lta ba la rag las pa yin gyi /
analyzed: des na snang ba nges pa lta ba la rag las pa yin gyi /
translated: Thus, the appearance of blue is ascertained by the eye consciousness, but ascertainment of blue is dependent on view.

original: 'on kyang zhen pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhen pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not ascertainment.

original: gal te dngos po'i nges pa zhen par ma byas pas skad cig ma yang de ltar 'jug pa'i yul ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po'i nges pa zhen par ma byas pas skad cig ma yang de ltar 'jug pa'i yul ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But if ascertainment of blue is not ascertained, then blue is not the object of engagement.

original: the tshom gyis ni ci 'di sngon po nyid dam /🔽'on te dngos po ma yin pa nyid ces nges pa nyid zhen par byas pa yin gyi /
analyzed: the tshom gyis ni ci 'di sngon po nyid dam / 'on te dngos po ma yin pa nyid ces nges pa nyid zhen par byas pa yin gyi /
translated: Doubt ascertains blue, thinking, “Is this blue or not blue?”🔽But it does not ascertain blue, thinking, “This is blue.”

original: gang gi phyir nges pa zhen par ma byas par 'gyur pa 'di ni sngo po yang yin no zhes bya bar ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nges pa zhen par ma byas par 'gyur pa 'di ni sngo po yang yin no zhes bya bar ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, blue is ascertained by doubt, but not ascertained by ascertainment.

original: de'i phyir nges pa'i 'jug pa'i yul ni mthong ba nyid du zhen par byas pa yin la de ni the tshom gyis kyang mthong ba nyid tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa'i 'jug pa'i yul ni mthong ba nyid du zhen par byas pa yin la de ni the tshom gyis kyang mthong ba nyid tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the object of the activity of ascertainment is taken to be seeing itself, and that is also taken to be seeing conventionally by doubt.

original: 'on kyang the tshom ma ni rang bzhin gcig tu mi gnas la mthong ba ni gnas pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: 'on kyang the tshom ma ni rang bzhin gcig tu mi gnas la mthong ba ni gnas pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: But doubt does not remain in a single nature, while seeing is only a remaining.

original: the tshom ni mi gnas pa yin la /
analyzed: the tshom ni mi gnas pa yin la /
translated: Doubt is non-remaining,

original: mthong ba ni gnas pa yin no zhes 'jig rten na yang shes pa yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba ni gnas pa yin no zhes 'jig rten na yang shes pa yin no //
translated: while seeing is remaining. This is known in the world.

original: de'i phyir mthong ba'i bya ba'i rjes su byed pa'i the tshom dang mtha' gcig tu nges par snang ba'i tha snyad du byas bar khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mthong ba'i bya ba'i rjes su byed pa'i the tshom dang mtha' gcig tu nges par snang ba'i tha snyad du byas bar khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is no difference between doubt, which follows the activity of seeing, and the conventional appearance of ascertainment.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gal te 'khrul ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa sgro btags pa nyid mngon sum gyi gnod par brjod kyi the tshom ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gal te 'khrul ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa sgro btags pa nyid mngon sum gyi gnod par brjod kyi the tshom ni ma yin no //
translated: For this very reason, it is said that superimposition is undermined by perception, not by doubt, when it is said, “If it is due to the reason of error,” and so on.

original: gang yang dngos po'i rang bzhin lam rer pa'i the tshom ni dper na chu dmar po la ci 'on te me 'am 'on te pa la sha'i me tog gi tshogs yin zhes bya ba lta bu dngos po'i cha spangs pa ste /
analyzed: gang yang dngos po'i rang bzhin lam rer pa'i the tshom ni dper na chu dmar po la ci 'on te me 'am 'on te pa la sha'i me tog gi tshogs yin zhes bya ba lta bu dngos po'i cha spangs pa ste /
translated: Doubt about the nature of a thing is like the doubt about whether a red river is a river of fire or a mass of the flowers of the palasha tree.

original: sgro btags dang 'dra bar mngon sum la gnod pa yin no //
analyzed: sgro btags dang 'dra bar mngon sum la gnod pa yin no //
translated: It is like a superimposition that is contradicted by perception.

original: @228b mngon sum mi snang ba nges pa zhen pa gang yin pa de ni thob par nus pa'i phyir na de nyid thob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no zhes gnas so //
analyzed: @228b mngon sum mi snang ba nges pa zhen pa gang yin pa de ni thob par nus pa'i phyir na de nyid thob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no zhes gnas so //
translated: Since it is possible to obtain the object that is the referent of a conceptual consciousness that is certain that something does not appear to perception, it is a valid knowledge because it causes one to obtain that object.🔽Obtaining it from a connection is also like that.

original: 'brel ba las ni thob pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di yang rjes su dpag pa ji ltar nges par byas pa de yang 'brel pa yin la shes pa gzhan ji ltar nges par bya ba de dang ma 'brel pa yin te des na thob par byed pa
analyzed: 'brel ba las ni thob pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di yang rjes su dpag pa ji ltar nges par byas pa de yang 'brel pa yin la shes pa gzhan ji ltar nges par bya ba de dang ma 'brel pa yin te des na thob par byed pa
translated: How is it that what is ascertained by inference is a connection, but what is ascertained by another consciousness is not a connection? Therefore, it is not a valid knowledge because it does not cause one to obtain the object.

original: ma yin gyi 'dir nges pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir 'brel pa 'dod pa ni shes par mi bya'o //
analyzed: ma yin gyi 'dir nges pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir 'brel pa 'dod pa ni shes par mi bya'o //
translated: However, since it does not rely on ascertaining the connection, it is not asserted to be a valid knowledge.

original: gal te des nges par 'jug pa'i yul yin na ni nges par rtog pa dang nges pa mthong ba zhen pa tshad ma'i bya ba rdzogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te des nges par 'jug pa'i yul yin na ni nges par rtog pa dang nges pa mthong ba zhen pa tshad ma'i bya ba rdzogs pa yin no //
translated: If it is the object of certain engagement, then the activity of the valid cognition of ascertainment is complete.

original: ci ste dngos po gang zhig nges pa na gang 'jug pa'i yul du mi 'gyur ba nges par ma bya pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste dngos po gang zhig nges pa na gang 'jug pa'i yul du mi 'gyur ba nges par ma bya pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: But if one says that it is not ascertained, then what is the thing that is not ascertained, when it is ascertained that it is the object of engagement?

original: 'di la brjod par bya ba ci yod nges par rtogs pa gang yin pa de las gzhan du nges pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod par bya ba ci yod nges par rtogs pa gang yin pa de las gzhan du nges pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: What is there to say? It is the ascertainment that is different from the ascertainment.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: yul dang dus dang rnam pa 'ga' zhig ma nges pa 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: yul dang dus dang rnam pa 'ga' zhig ma nges pa 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is that which is not ascertained in some place, time, or aspect, and which possesses contradictory properties.

original: yul dang dus dang rnam pa tha dad pa yang tha dad par byed pa yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: yul dang dus dang rnam pa tha dad pa yang tha dad par byed pa yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the difference in place, time, and aspect is the cause of difference.

original: tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa'i ni sna tshogs gcig tu thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa'i ni sna tshogs gcig tu thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if it were not the cause of difference, it would follow that the various would be one.

original: 'di tsam nyid 'gal ba'i chos dang 'brel ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di tsam nyid 'gal ba'i chos dang 'brel ba ma yin te /
translated: This much alone is not the connection with contradictory properties.

original: 'dir ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don du ji tsam zhig rjod par byed par 'os pa de tsam zhig bshad do //
analyzed: 'dir ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don du ji tsam zhig rjod par byed par 'os pa de tsam zhig bshad do //
translated: Here, we have explained only as much as is necessary to illustrate the point.

original: de la dngos po ni mthong ba de nyid yin no //
analyzed: de la dngos po ni mthong ba de nyid yin no //
translated: The object is the very same thing that is seen.

original: yul gzhan dang 'brel ba yin na ni tshad ma'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: yul gzhan dang 'brel ba yin na ni tshad ma'i yul ma yin no //
translated: If it were related to another object, it would not be the object of valid cognition.

original: dper na sgo leb kyi bu gar nor bu nges pa khang ba'i dang na gnas pa'i nor bu las nges pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sgo leb kyi bu gar nor bu nges pa khang ba'i dang na gnas pa'i nor bu las nges pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the certainty about a gem in a hole in a wall is different from the certainty about a gem in a house.

original: 'dir re shig nor bu tsam nges pa yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir re shig nor bu tsam nges pa yin nam zhe na /
translated: Here, is it just the gem that is ascertained?

original: yul dang dus dang rnam pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i nor bu ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: yul dang dus dang rnam pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i nor bu ma nges pa yin no //
translated: The gem that possesses the distinctions of place, time, and form is not ascertained.

original: nor bu tsam don du gnyer ba'i phyir ni thob par bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: nor bu tsam don du gnyer ba'i phyir ni thob par bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not to be obtained for the sake of just the gem,

original: 'on kyang nges pa las yin la nges pa yang khyad par gyi yul can gyin pa'i phyir rong bu tsam ni thob par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang nges pa las yin la nges pa yang khyad par gyi yul can gyin pa'i phyir rong bu tsam ni thob par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: but rather from the ascertainment, and since ascertainment has a particular object, just the gem is not to be obtained.

original: 'bras bu 'dod pas skyed pa de sgrub par byed pa'i don chen gyi bya ba 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'dod pas skyed pa de sgrub par byed pa'i don chen gyi bya ba 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The result is the engagement of the great purpose of the action that is to be accomplished by the one who desires the result.

original: de yang lus dang dag dang lhan cig pa'i blo 'jug par byed pa'i shes pa'i bya ba lta bu dang rtog pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can de nyid kyis nye bar bstan pa yul dang dus dang rnam pa @229a * //
analyzed: de yang lus dang dag dang lhan cig pa'i blo 'jug par byed pa'i shes pa'i bya ba lta bu dang rtog pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can de nyid kyis nye bar bstan pa yul dang dus dang rnam pa @229a * //
translated: And that is like the action of the cognition that engages the mind along with the body and the sense faculties. It is indicated by that very thing that follows the thought. The object, time, and aspect

original: nges pa'i dngos po thob par 'dod pa 'jug par byed pa'i shes pas brtsams pa rab tu bstan pa'i dngos po'i mthar thug pa ni gcig yin par lta'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i dngos po thob par 'dod pa 'jug par byed pa'i shes pas brtsams pa rab tu bstan pa'i dngos po'i mthar thug pa ni gcig yin par lta'o //
translated: are ascertained. The one who desires to obtain the thing engages the cognition that begins the demonstration of the thing. The ultimate is seen as one.

original: dngos po'i yul can ni gzhan yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i yul can ni gzhan yin no //
translated: The object of the thing is another.

original: skabs su bab pa'i don bya ba la nye bar sbyor ba ma nges par shes pa gang yin pa de ni du ma yin yang 'jug pa gcig gi yul yin no //
analyzed: skabs su bab pa'i don bya ba la nye bar sbyor ba ma nges par shes pa gang yin pa de ni du ma yin yang 'jug pa gcig gi yul yin no //
translated: The cognition that is not ascertained in the application to the action that is the present occasion, even though it is many, is the object of one engagement.

original: 'jug pa gcig gi yul yang tshad ma gcig gi yul yin no //
analyzed: 'jug pa gcig gi yul yang tshad ma gcig gi yul yin no //
translated: The object of one engagement is the object of one valid cognition.

original: nye bar sbyor ba gang yin par shes pa de ni nges par med do //
analyzed: nye bar sbyor ba gang yin par shes pa de ni nges par med do //
translated: The cognition that is the application is not ascertained.

original: res 'ga' ni tshad ma gcig gi yul yin la /
analyzed: res 'ga' ni tshad ma gcig gi yul yin la /
translated: Sometimes it is the object of one valid cognition,

original: res 'ga' ni tshad ma du ma'i yul yin no //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni tshad ma du ma'i yul yin no //
translated: and sometimes it is the object of many valid cognitions.

original: de la mngon sum ni skad cig tha dad pa la nye bar sbyor ba nges pa med par zhen par byed kyi tshogs pa tha dad pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de la mngon sum ni skad cig tha dad pa la nye bar sbyor ba nges pa med par zhen par byed kyi tshogs pa tha dad pas ni ma yin no //
translated: Direct perception is applied to different moments, and it apprehends without certainty, not by way of a different collection.

original: gang gi phyir mthong ba'i bum pa rnam la ni gal te nus pa thams cad kyi bsgrub par bya ba gcig gam du ma cung zad cig dgos la de'i tshe bum pa rnams nye bar sbyor ba tha dad pa rnams kho nar shes pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mthong ba'i bum pa rnam la ni gal te nus pa thams cad kyi bsgrub par bya ba gcig gam du ma cung zad cig dgos la de'i tshe bum pa rnams nye bar sbyor ba tha dad pa rnams kho nar shes pa yin no //
translated: Because in the case of a seen pot, if it is necessary to establish a single effect or many effects, then it is known that the applications of the pot are different.

original: yang gang gi tshe bum pa gcig gi bsgrub par bya ba dgos pa de'i tshe mthong ba'i mdo kho na la nges pa gcig len par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: yang gang gi tshe bum pa gcig gi bsgrub par bya ba dgos pa de'i tshe mthong ba'i mdo kho na la nges pa gcig len par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: And when it is necessary to establish a single pot, then it is asserted that certainty is taken only with respect to the seen sutra.

original: blang bar 'dod pa nyid kyang ma yin pa kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: blang bar 'dod pa nyid kyang ma yin pa kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: And it is not just what is asserted to be taken, but nothing else.

original: des na nges par blang bar 'dod pa ni nges par sbyor bar nges pa yin pa de'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul tha dad par nges pa yin no //
analyzed: des na nges par blang bar 'dod pa ni nges par sbyor bar nges pa yin pa de'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul tha dad par nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the desire to definitely accept is the definite application. Therefore, the object of engagement is definitely different.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i tshogs tha da dpa la ma nges par zhen pas byed pa dper na rtsig pa bzhis bskor ba'i khyim gyi dang rang du ba mthong nas me ma yin pa las log pa'i me tsam nges par byed pa na ji snyed yod pa de thams
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i tshogs tha da dpa la ma nges par zhen pas byed pa dper na rtsig pa bzhis bskor ba'i khyim gyi dang rang du ba mthong nas me ma yin pa las log pa'i me tsam nges par byed pa na ji snyed yod pa de thams
translated: In the case of inferential cognition, there is the determination of what is not ascertained. For example, when one sees smoke in a house surrounded by four walls, and ascertains mere fire that is the opposite of non-fire, to the extent that it exists,

original: cad rjes su dpag cing gang gi phyir thams cad kyang nye bar sbyor ba nges pa med par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: cad rjes su dpag cing gang gi phyir thams cad kyang nye bar sbyor ba nges pa med par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: all of it is inferred. Because there is no certainty in the application of all of it.

original: de lta yin dang khyim gyi dang ra de nyid du du ba gzhan mthong bas mer nges pa de la ni shes pa tshad ma yin gyi //
analyzed: de lta yin dang khyim gyi dang ra de nyid du du ba gzhan mthong bas mer nges pa de la ni shes pa tshad ma yin gyi //
translated: If that were the case, when one sees another smoke in that very house, the ascertainment of fire by that cognition would be valid cognition.

original: 'on kyang dran pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang dran pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: However, it would not be memory itself.

original: gang gi phyir dang ra na gnas pa'i me ma yin pa las ldog pa'i rang bzhin don bya ba'i nya bar mkho ba ni snga ma bzhin du bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dang ra na gnas pa'i me ma yin pa las ldog pa'i rang bzhin don bya ba'i nya bar mkho ba ni snga ma bzhin du bzung ba yin no //
translated: Because the nature of the fire that is in the hearth is required for the performance of the action of cooking, just as before.

original: gang gi tshe nye bar sbyor ba tha dad pa de'i tshe ni du ba gzhan dang gzhan gyis gzhan la yang don bya ba byed pa'i phyir na de'i yul can rnams tshad ma tha dad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nye bar sbyor ba tha dad pa de'i tshe ni du ba gzhan dang gzhan gyis gzhan la yang don bya ba byed pa'i phyir na de'i yul can rnams tshad ma tha dad pa kho na'o //
translated: But when the application is different, then, because the different fires perform different actions, the cognitions of them are different valid cognitions.

original: yang gang @229b gi tshe phyogs bzhir du ba bzhi las me rjes su dpag pa la don byed pa la /
analyzed: yang gang @229b gi tshe phyogs bzhir du ba bzhi las me rjes su dpag pa la don byed pa la /
translated: And when, in the four directions, one infers fire from the four smokes, the performance of the action of cooking

original: gcig nye bar mkho ba de'i tshe yang rjes su dpag pa'i mod kho na la nges par zhen par 'dod la /
analyzed: gcig nye bar mkho ba de'i tshe yang rjes su dpag pa'i mod kho na la nges par zhen par 'dod la /
translated: requires only one fire, and at the very moment of the inference, one is satisfied.

original: gang blang bar bya ba 'dod pa de nyid kyis nye bar mkho ba yin pa'i phyir de dag nye bar sbyor ba tha dad pas tshad ma tha dad pa'i gzung ba yin no //
analyzed: gang blang bar bya ba 'dod pa de nyid kyis nye bar mkho ba yin pa'i phyir de dag nye bar sbyor ba tha dad pas tshad ma tha dad pa'i gzung ba yin no //
translated: But because the one who desires to take up the action requires only one fire, the application of the different cognitions is different, and so the cognitions are different valid cognitions.

original: 'di thams cad brjod pa'i don du du ba gzhan dang gzhan gyis bcad pa'i me nye ba bzhin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: 'di thams cad brjod pa'i don du du ba gzhan dang gzhan gyis bcad pa'i me nye ba bzhin no zhes bshad do //
translated: All of this is like the fire that is inferred from the smoke that is not interrupted by other things.

original: de'i phyir nges pa'i dbang gis thob par bya ba yin gyi don du gnyer ba'i dbang gis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa'i dbang gis thob par bya ba yin gyi don du gnyer ba'i dbang gis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di rigs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to say that the object is obtained by the power of ascertainment, not by the power of seeking.

original: dus tha dad pas kyang dngos po tha dad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dus tha dad pas kyang dngos po tha dad pa'i phyir te /
translated: Also, because of the difference in time, the object is different.

original: mtshan mo bu 'ongs pa mthong na mthong nas nyid mo bu 'ongs pa de lta na yang mtshan mo bu mthong ba ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshan mo bu 'ongs pa mthong na mthong nas nyid mo bu 'ongs pa de lta na yang mtshan mo bu mthong ba ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: If one sees the son come in the evening, and then sees the son come in the morning, the seeing of the son in the evening is not valid cognition,

original: nam phyed kyi khyad par can gyi bu 'ongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam phyed kyi khyad par can gyi bu 'ongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the son coming at midnight is not excluded.

original: rnam pa zhes bya ba ni don byed par bzod pa'i rang bzhin la brjod do //
analyzed: rnam pa zhes bya ba ni don byed par bzod pa'i rang bzhin la brjod do //
translated: The term “aspect” refers to the nature of being able to perform a function.

original: 'don de la ni kha dog don dam pa yin gyi dbyibs ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'don de la ni kha dog don dam pa yin gyi dbyibs ni ma yin te /
translated: In that case, color is the ultimate object, not shape.

original: rdul phra rab la ni ring ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir dang / rdul phra rab ma gtogs pa'i gzugs kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdul phra rab la ni ring ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir dang / rdul phra rab ma gtogs pa'i gzugs kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the atom has no dimension, and because there is no form apart from the atom.

original: rdul phra rab ni kha dog yin la /
analyzed: rdul phra rab ni kha dog yin la /
translated: The atom is color.

original: dbyibs ni yod du zin kyang kha dog gi rdul phra rab rnams las tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dbyibs ni yod du zin kyang kha dog gi rdul phra rab rnams las tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if shape exists, it is not distinct from the atoms of color.

original: des na dper na skad cig ma'i nyid sngo po la sogs pa las tha dad pa ma yin la sngon po la sogs pa ma bzung na ni de'i ngo bor gyur ba'i dngos po nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du dbyibs kyang ngo //
analyzed: des na dper na skad cig ma'i nyid sngo po la sogs pa las tha dad pa ma yin la sngon po la sogs pa ma bzung na ni de'i ngo bor gyur ba'i dngos po nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du dbyibs kyang ngo //
translated: Thus, for example, the state of being momentary is not distinct from the blue, etc., and if the blue, etc., are not apprehended, the state of being momentary is not apprehended.

original: spyi'i chos rnam ni khyad par gyi rang bzhin du yod pa yin la /
analyzed: spyi'i chos rnam ni khyad par gyi rang bzhin du yod pa yin la /
translated: The universal, which is a property of the particular, exists in the particular.

original: khyad par ma bzung na ni mi zin la /
analyzed: khyad par ma bzung na ni mi zin la /
translated: If the particular is not apprehended, the universal is not apprehended.

original: khyad par gzung ba na ni bzung ba yin zhing ma nges na ni tshad ma gzhan gyis nges par byed do //
analyzed: khyad par gzung ba na ni bzung ba yin zhing ma nges na ni tshad ma gzhan gyis nges par byed do //
translated: If the particular is apprehended, the universal is apprehended. If it is not ascertained, it is ascertained by another means of valid knowledge.

original: gang gi tshe smig rgyu la chur 'khrul du chug kyang dngos po nyid tsam la ni ma yin no zhes ni brjod par mi nus te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe smig rgyu la chur 'khrul du chug kyang dngos po nyid tsam la ni ma yin no zhes ni brjod par mi nus te /
translated: But you cannot say that although one may be mistaken about water in a mirage, one is not mistaken about mere entity.

original: gang gi phyir chu la 'khrul pa na chu yod pa la nges par 'khrul ba yin la gzhan gyi yod pa yang gzhan gyi khyad par bzhin du gzung ba de'i phyir gang zhig la 'khrul pa med /
analyzed: gang gi phyir chu la 'khrul pa na chu yod pa la nges par 'khrul ba yin la gzhan gyi yod pa yang gzhan gyi khyad par bzhin du gzung ba de'i phyir gang zhig la 'khrul pa med /
translated: Because when one is mistaken about water, one is definitely mistaken about the existence of water. And the existence of one thing is apprehended as the particular of another. Therefore, what is not mistaken?

original: de bzhin du dung gi dkar po btang na de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba'i dbyibs btang na ser po'i rang bzhin phyin ci log tu 'gyur na de'i rang bzhin du gyur ba'i dbyibs phyin ci log @230a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du dung gi dkar po btang na de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba'i dbyibs btang na ser po'i rang bzhin phyin ci log tu 'gyur na de'i rang bzhin du gyur ba'i dbyibs phyin ci log @230a * //
translated: In the same way, if the white of a conch is abandoned, then the shape that is its nature is abandoned. If the shape is abandoned, then the yellow that is its nature is mistaken.

original: yin pa'i phyir dung la ser por shes pa la ni mi slu ba'i zhad tsam yang yod pa ma yin te /🔽dkar po dang ser po dag tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yin pa'i phyir dung la ser por shes pa la ni mi slu ba'i zhad tsam yang yod pa ma yin te / dkar po dang ser po dag tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the cognition of yellow in a conch is not even slightly non-mistaken, because white and yellow are different.

original: des na rnam pa tha da dpa'i phyir ser po las ni dung dkar po thob pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rnam pa tha da dpa'i phyir ser po las ni dung dkar po thob pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because the aspects are different, it is not the case that one obtains a white conch from a yellow one.

original: 'o na ji ltar ser po shes pa las zhugs pa las dung dkar po thob ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar ser po shes pa las zhugs pa las dung dkar po thob ce na /
translated: But how can one obtain a white conch through the operation of a consciousness of yellow?

original: shes pa gzhan las yin par smra'o //
analyzed: shes pa gzhan las yin par smra'o //
translated: We say that it is through the operation of another consciousness.

original: dkar po dang ser po snang ba dag 'brel pa gzung ba yod na ni rjes su dpag pa yin te /
analyzed: dkar po dang ser po snang ba dag 'brel pa gzung ba yod na ni rjes su dpag pa yin te /
translated: If there were a memory of the connection between the appearance of white and the appearance of yellow, then the white conch would be inferred.

original: dper na ral gu'i nang na gnas pa'i lus rjes su dpag pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na ral gu'i nang na gnas pa'i lus rjes su dpag pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, one infers the body that is inside the sheath.

original: yang dper na chu'i shes pa las ni smig rgyu thob pa ma yin gyi shes pa gzhan las yin pa de bzhin du 'am /
analyzed: yang dper na chu'i shes pa las ni smig rgyu thob pa ma yin gyi shes pa gzhan las yin pa de bzhin du 'am /
translated: Or, just as one does not obtain a mirage through the operation of a consciousness of water, but through the operation of another consciousness,

original: the tshom las zhugs pas shes pa gzhan las don thob par byed pa de bzhin du thob pa ni tha na reg bya'i shes pa las yin no //
analyzed: the tshom las zhugs pas shes pa gzhan las don thob par byed pa de bzhin du thob pa ni tha na reg bya'i shes pa las yin no //
translated: in the same way, one obtains an object through the operation of another consciousness, even if one has doubt about it.

original: sgo gseb kyi bu gar gnas pa'i mthong ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa las ni khang phugs na gnas pa'i nor bu'i gnas 'dzin par byed pa yin pas na nor bu thob po zhes smra'o //
analyzed: sgo gseb kyi bu gar gnas pa'i mthong ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa las ni khang phugs na gnas pa'i nor bu'i gnas 'dzin par byed pa yin pas na nor bu thob po zhes smra'o //
translated: One obtains a jewel through the operation of the visual consciousness that sees the jewel in the hole of a wall, even though one does not see the jewel.

original: de'i phyir phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'gal ba nges pa las gang shin tu ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir na yul ma yin no //🔽gal te de ltar na skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid dang / rags pa dang / tshad chung ba dang / mi gsal ba dang 'dres pas thag ring po na gnas pa rnams nges pa na ji ltar skad cig ma dang phra mi dang gsal ba dang /
analyzed: de'i phyir phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'gal ba nges pa las gang shin tu ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir na yul ma yin no // gal te de ltar na skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid dang / rags pa dang / tshad chung ba dang / mi gsal ba dang 'dres pas thag ring po na gnas pa rnams nges pa na ji ltar skad cig ma dang phra mi dang gsal ba dang /
translated: Therefore, since it is not ascertained that they are mutually exclusive, it is not the object of the inference.

original: tshad che ba dang / ma 'dres pa'i shing la sogs po'i tshad mas thob ce na /
analyzed: tshad che ba dang / ma 'dres pa'i shing la sogs po'i tshad mas thob ce na /
translated: If that is so, then when the non-momentariness, grossness, small size, indistinctness, and distant location of things are ascertained, how can the momentariness, subtlety, largeness, distinctness, and nearness of trees and so on be established by valid knowledge?

original: rigs pa non cig /
analyzed: rigs pa non cig /
translated: Listen to the reasoning.

original: 'di la dngos po dbyibs dang ldan pa nges par don bya ba'i rang bzhin ni mngon sum ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la dngos po dbyibs dang ldan pa nges par don bya ba'i rang bzhin ni mngon sum ma yin no //
translated: In this regard, the nature of things possessing shape is not ascertained by direct perception.

original: sngon po de yang skad cig ma nyid dang skad cig ma ma yin pa'i thun mong gi tshogs yin te /
analyzed: sngon po de yang skad cig ma nyid dang skad cig ma ma yin pa'i thun mong gi tshogs yin te /
translated: That blue is a collection of moments and non-moments is common to both.

original: snang ba'i sngon po la ni yul ring ba mi 'gal ba 'am myur du yang rung ste /
analyzed: snang ba'i sngon po la ni yul ring ba mi 'gal ba 'am myur du yang rung ste /
translated: In the case of blue appearances, it is not contradictory for distant objects to be small or for them to be large and near.

original: gang yang nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang yang nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is no certainty at all.

original: de'i phyir gal te 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig la thun mong gi rang bzhin du nges pa la skad cig ma ma yin par sgro 'dogs kyang de tsam gyis skad cig ma yin pa nyid du nges par 'gyur ram //
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig la thun mong gi rang bzhin du nges pa la skad cig ma ma yin par sgro 'dogs kyang de tsam gyis skad cig ma yin pa nyid du nges par 'gyur ram //
translated: Therefore, if one ascertains a common nature in some reason for error, and superimposes non-momentariness, then it is not the case that one is certain of momentariness.

original: skad cig ma nyid dang 'gal ba'i rang bzhin bzung na ni sna tshogs skad cig ma ni ma yin par @230b rung ste /
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid dang 'gal ba'i rang bzhin bzung na ni sna tshogs skad cig ma ni ma yin par @230b rung ste /
translated: If one grasps a nature that is incompatible with momentariness, then it is possible that the variety is not momentary.

original: nges pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nges pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is no certainty.

original: des na thun mong du yod pa yin te /
analyzed: des na thun mong du yod pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is common to both,

original: de'i phyir skad cig ma yin pa ni dus phyis 'khrul pas sgo btags pa yin no zhes bya bar gzung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir skad cig ma yin pa ni dus phyis 'khrul pas sgo btags pa yin no zhes bya bar gzung ngo //
translated: and thus one should understand that momentariness is imputed by later error.

original: de bzhin du gcig gi rang bzhin phra mo yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du gcig gi rang bzhin phra mo yin la /
translated: In the same way, the subtle is the nature of one,

original: du ma ni rags pa yin no //
analyzed: du ma ni rags pa yin no //
translated: and the gross is the nature of many.

original: de la gal te rags pa gcig mthong na ni 'gal ba mthong bar 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: de la gal te rags pa gcig mthong na ni 'gal ba mthong bar 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: If one sees the gross as one, then one sees what is incompatible.

original: gang gi tshe du ma mthong ba de'i tshe gcig ni phra mo yin la du ma nyid ni rags pa'i phyir 'gal ba ci yod /
analyzed: gang gi tshe du ma mthong ba de'i tshe gcig ni phra mo yin la du ma nyid ni rags pa'i phyir 'gal ba ci yod /
translated: But when many are seen, then one is subtle and many are gross, so what is the contradiction?

original: gang yang ma mthong ba nyid ni phra mo'i tshogs pa yin par bsgrub par nus pa'i phyir mi 'gal lo //🔽gang yang gsal ba yang rgyang ring po nas mi gsal bar snang ba de yang rdul dang 'dras ba yin te /
analyzed: gang yang ma mthong ba nyid ni phra mo'i tshogs pa yin par bsgrub par nus pa'i phyir mi 'gal lo // gang yang gsal ba yang rgyang ring po nas mi gsal bar snang ba de yang rdul dang 'dras ba yin te /
translated: And that which is not seen at all can be established as a collection of subtle particles, so there is no contradiction.🔽And that which is clear is seen unclearly from a distance, because it is mixed with particles.

original: rdul dang 'dres pa yang mthong ba dang mi gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: rdul dang 'dres pa yang mthong ba dang mi gsal ba yin no //
translated: And that which is mixed with particles is seen unclearly.

original: de'i phyir 'dres pa 'dzin pa mi gsal bar 'dzin pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dres pa 'dzin pa mi gsal bar 'dzin pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the apprehension of the mixed is the apprehension of the unclear.

original: gcig la 'gal bar gzung ba ni ma yin no /
analyzed: gcig la 'gal bar gzung ba ni ma yin no /
translated: It is not the apprehension of a contradiction in one.

original: rta rmig gis snad ba'i lam nas sangs pa'i rdul gyis bar du chod pa'i snam bu sngo po bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: rta rmig gis snad ba'i lam nas sangs pa'i rdul gyis bar du chod pa'i snam bu sngo po bzung ba yin no //
translated: A cloth is apprehended as blue when the path is cleared of dust by the hooves of horses.

original: rdul yang bsangs pa na snang bar 'gyur ro ji srid thag ring po na de srid du sang bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: rdul yang bsangs pa na snang bar 'gyur ro ji srid thag ring po na de srid du sang bar 'gyur la /
translated: And when the dust is cleared, it becomes visible.

original: ji srid du nye bar 'gyur ba de srid du mi snag bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji srid du nye bar 'gyur ba de srid du mi snag bar 'gyur te /
translated: As long as it is not accumulated, it is not visible,

original: ma bsags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma bsags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not accumulated.

original: dper na rdul gyi cha cung zad dang dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi ser po nyams par dmigs kyi rdul logs su mi snang ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rdul gyi cha cung zad dang dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi ser po nyams par dmigs kyi rdul logs su mi snang ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, one observes the destruction of a small part of the atom and the color of the red, but not the atom itself.

original: de ni rdzas gzhan nyid skyes pa yin no zhes brjod par mi nus te /
analyzed: de ni rdzas gzhan nyid skyes pa yin no zhes brjod par mi nus te /
translated: One cannot say that it is produced as a different substance,

original: yang mkhas pas de dag so sor byed pa mthong ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: yang mkhas pas de dag so sor byed pa mthong ba'i phyir te /
translated: because the wise see them as separate.

original: nye bar len pa gcig la rang bzhin tha dad pa dag skye ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar len pa gcig la rang bzhin tha dad pa dag skye ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not tenable that different natures are produced in one appropriation.

original: de bzhin du rdul ni mi dmigs pa de dag 'dres pa'i kha dog gzhan mi gsal bar dmigs pa'i phyir gnyis ka mi gsal bas bzung ba yin gyi //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdul ni mi dmigs pa de dag 'dres pa'i kha dog gzhan mi gsal bar dmigs pa'i phyir gnyis ka mi gsal bas bzung ba yin gyi //
translated: In the same way, the atom is not observed, because the other color of the mixture is observed as unclear, and both are grasped as unclear.

original: gcig la gsal ba dang mi gsal ba nyid du bzung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ci zhig 'gal /
analyzed: gcig la gsal ba dang mi gsal ba nyid du bzung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ci zhig 'gal /
translated: What is the contradiction in grasping one as clear and unclear?

original: chen po la chung dur nges pa zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de la yang /
analyzed: chen po la chung dur nges pa zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de la yang /
translated: That which is called “the determination of the great as small” is also like this.

original: dbyibs zhes bya ba ni snang ba'i chos yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: dbyibs zhes bya ba ni snang ba'i chos yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: It is said that “shape” is a visible phenomenon, but it is not a real entity.

original: tshad kyang dbyibs kyi chos yin te /
analyzed: tshad kyang dbyibs kyi chos yin te /
translated: Dimension is also a property of shape.

original: de'i phyir dbyibs sngon po ma yin na tshad kyang dngos po'i chos su mi 'gyur bas de la 'khrul kyang dngos po las 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbyibs sngon po ma yin na tshad kyang dngos po'i chos su mi 'gyur bas de la 'khrul kyang dngos po las 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, if shape is not blue, dimension would not be a property of a real entity. Thus, even though there is error, there is no contradiction with a real entity.

original: gal te de lta @231a * //
analyzed: gal te de lta @231a * //
translated: If that is so,

original: na ni mya ngam na chung ngu la chen por 'dzin par 'khrul pa ji ltar zhe na //
analyzed: na ni mya ngam na chung ngu la chen por 'dzin par 'khrul pa ji ltar zhe na //
translated: then how is there error in apprehending a small object in a desert as being great?

original: nyon cig de la yul de dang de ma yin pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi 'gal ba yod pa yin te //
analyzed: nyon cig de la yul de dang de ma yin pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi 'gal ba yod pa yin te //
translated: Listen! There is a contradiction in that object and that which is not its cause.

original: gang gi phyir na chung du ni yul gzhan la gnas pa yin la //
analyzed: gang gi phyir na chung du ni yul gzhan la gnas pa yin la //
translated: This is because a small object is located in another place.

original: chen po ni rgya chen po'i go skabs kyi yul khyad par mthong ba yin pa de'i phyir yul de na gnas pa dang // de'i yul na mi gnas pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi 'gal ba yod pa yin te //
analyzed: chen po ni rgya chen po'i go skabs kyi yul khyad par mthong ba yin pa de'i phyir yul de na gnas pa dang // de'i yul na mi gnas pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi 'gal ba yod pa yin te //
translated: The great is the seeing of the object of a special extensive scope. Therefore, there is a contradiction in the reason for being in that place and not being in that place.

original: dper na mgal me'i 'khor lor snang ba'i shes pa dbyibs 'khrul pa ni yul de na mi gnas pa'i yul de na gnas pa nyid de'i yul 'gal bar 'dzin pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mgal me'i 'khor lor snang ba'i shes pa dbyibs 'khrul pa ni yul de na mi gnas pa'i yul de na gnas pa nyid de'i yul 'gal bar 'dzin pa de bzhin no //
translated: For example, the cognition of the shape of the appearance of a fire wheel is not in that place, but it is as if it were in that place, and it apprehends the object as if it were contradictory to that place.

original: rnam pa de nyid kyis chung du la chen por 'dzin pa yul 'gal ba yod pa yin no zhes 'dod pa de ni ma yin te //
analyzed: rnam pa de nyid kyis chung du la chen por 'dzin pa yul 'gal ba yod pa yin no zhes 'dod pa de ni ma yin te //
translated: In the same way, the apprehension of the small as great has a contradictory object.

original: gang gi phyir dngos po de'i so mtshams gang dang ldan par mthong bas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po de'i so mtshams gang dang ldan par mthong bas so //
translated: This is not accepted, because the boundary of that thing is seen to be connected.

original: mtshams de nyid la ma 'khrul ba thag ring po na chung ngur snang ba yin la chung ngu la chen por snang ba gang yin pa de ni dngos po'i so mtshams las 'das nas nam mkha'i cha khyab par snang ba'i phyir chen po la chung ngur snang ba
analyzed: mtshams de nyid la ma 'khrul ba thag ring po na chung ngur snang ba yin la chung ngu la chen por snang ba gang yin pa de ni dngos po'i so mtshams las 'das nas nam mkha'i cha khyab par snang ba'i phyir chen po la chung ngur snang ba
translated: The mistaken is the small appearing as large because it appears to pervade the space beyond the boundary of the thing.

original: 'khrul pa yin la chung ngu chen por snang ba ni ma 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa yin la chung ngu chen por snang ba ni ma 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: The non-mistaken is the small appearing as large.

original: gang yang shing la sogs pa ma 'dres pa la 'dres par 'dzin pa de ni bar chad ces bya ba'i dngos po gzhan ma bzung par de stong pa'i dngos po nyid bzung ba de'i tshe bar ma chad par bzung bar 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: gang yang shing la sogs pa ma 'dres pa la 'dres par 'dzin pa de ni bar chad ces bya ba'i dngos po gzhan ma bzung par de stong pa'i dngos po nyid bzung ba de'i tshe bar ma chad par bzung bar 'gyur gyi //
translated: Also, the apprehension of the unmixed such as trees as mixed is the apprehension of an entity that is an obstruction. When that is apprehended as an empty entity, it is apprehended as uninterrupted.

original: yul dang dus dang rnam pa la sogs pa la 'khrul pa yod pa ni ma yin pa des na 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: yul dang dus dang rnam pa la sogs pa la 'khrul pa yod pa ni ma yin pa des na 'gal ba med do //
translated: But there is no error regarding place, time, aspect, and so on. Therefore there is no contradiction.

original: 'di snyam du bar chad dang bcas pa dang bar chad med pa 'gal lo snyam na de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du bar chad dang bcas pa dang bar chad med pa 'gal lo snyam na de ni mi rigs te /
translated: If you think that the interrupted and the uninterrupted are contradictory, that is illogical.

original: gang gi phyir 'dir dngos po'i rang bzhin la ni 'gal pa 'ga' yang med kyi //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dir dngos po'i rang bzhin la ni 'gal pa 'ga' yang med kyi //
translated: Because here there is no contradiction at all in the nature of things.

original: 'on kyang bar chad ces bya ba ni dngos po gzhan ma bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang bar chad ces bya ba ni dngos po gzhan ma bzung ba yin no //
translated: However, what is called an obstruction is the non-apprehension of another thing.

original: des na bar chad dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni bar chad ces bya ba'i dngos po yod par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na bar chad dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni bar chad ces bya ba'i dngos po yod par brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, what is called “with obstruction” is the expression of the existence of a thing called “obstruction.”

original: bar chad med pa zhes bya ba ni de ma bzung bar brjod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: bar chad med pa zhes bya ba ni de ma bzung bar brjod pa yin gyi /
translated: What is called “without obstruction” is the expression of the non-apprehension of that,

original: med pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: med pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not non-existence.

original: gal te rnam pa thams cad du dngos po nyid dam 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig bar chod pa dang bcas pa'am bar chad med par smra na /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa thams cad du dngos po nyid dam 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig bar chod pa dang bcas pa'am bar chad med par smra na /
translated: If one were to say that a thing itself, or mere apprehension, is always either with obstruction or without obstruction,

original: de'i tshe 'gal bar 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'gal bar 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: then there would be a contradiction.

original: gang gi tshe dngos po'i bar chad dang bcas pa gzung gi bar chad med pa @231b de'i tshe bar chad dang bcas pa dang bar chad med pa dag yul tha dad pa'i phyir ci zhig 'gal /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dngos po'i bar chad dang bcas pa gzung gi bar chad med pa @231b de'i tshe bar chad dang bcas pa dang bar chad med pa dag yul tha dad pa'i phyir ci zhig 'gal /
translated: But when the obstruction of a thing is apprehended, not the absence of obstruction, then since those with obstruction and without obstruction have different objects, what is the contradiction?

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: 'di ni nges pa las gzhan thob pa ma yin gyi /🔽'on kyang skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid dam mi gsal ba nyid dam /
analyzed: 'di ni nges pa las gzhan thob pa ma yin gyi / 'on kyang skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid dam mi gsal ba nyid dam /
translated: This is not the obtainment of something other than what is ascertained.

original: mi rigs pa nyid dam gzhan yang rung ste /
analyzed: mi rigs pa nyid dam gzhan yang rung ste /
translated: But it is the non-momentariness, or the non-manifestation, or the non-reasonableness, or something else.

original: nges par byas shing thams cad mi thob par zad do //
analyzed: nges par byas shing thams cad mi thob par zad do //
translated: Having ascertained it, one does not obtain everything.

original: 'di ltar sngon po'i rang bzhin gyi skad cig ma nyid ni mthong ba'i sngon po'i rang bzhin nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar sngon po'i rang bzhin gyi skad cig ma nyid ni mthong ba'i sngon po'i rang bzhin nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the momentariness of the nature of blue is the nature of the seen blue, not something else.

original: de'i phyir mthong ba dang 'gal ba snga na med pa ni ci zhig thob /
analyzed: de'i phyir mthong ba dang 'gal ba snga na med pa ni ci zhig thob /
translated: Therefore, what is previously non-existent, which is contradictory to the seen, is not obtained.

original: phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'gal bar 'gyur ba yin na skad cig ma nyid ni sngon po spangs te gnas pa ma yin te de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'gal bar 'gyur ba yin na skad cig ma nyid ni sngon po spangs te gnas pa ma yin te de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the characteristic of mutually exclusive existence were contradiction, momentariness would not exist in mutual exclusion with blue, because it has that nature.

original: nges pa'i skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid dang ni sngon po'i rang bzhin du zhen pa'i skad cig ma 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: nges pa'i skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid dang ni sngon po'i rang bzhin du zhen pa'i skad cig ma 'gal ba yin no //
translated: The non-ascertainment of momentariness and the ascertainment of the nature of blue are contradictory.

original: skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid ni thob pa yin na gang gis na 'gal bar 'gyur /
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid ni thob pa yin na gang gis na 'gal bar 'gyur /
translated: If non-momentariness were obtained, what would be contradictory?

original: thob pa ni sngon po yin la de la ni 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: thob pa ni sngon po yin la de la ni 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Obtainment is blue, and that is contradictory.

original: gang yang yul gzhan na gnas pa'i nor bu'i rang bzhin ni de na gnas pa'i rang bzhin yongs su spangs nas gnas pa yin la dkar po yang ser po'i rang bzhin yongs su spangs te gnas pa des na /
analyzed: gang yang yul gzhan na gnas pa'i nor bu'i rang bzhin ni de na gnas pa'i rang bzhin yongs su spangs nas gnas pa yin la dkar po yang ser po'i rang bzhin yongs su spangs te gnas pa des na /
translated: Moreover, the nature of a jewel located in another place is located having abandoned the nature located there, and white is located having abandoned the nature of yellow.

original: de la ni nges pa las gzhan thob ba yin no //
analyzed: de la ni nges pa las gzhan thob ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is obtained from certainty.

original: de'i phyir khang pa'i nang na gnas pa'i nor bu dang dung dkar po ni sgo gseb na gnas pa'i nor bu 'dzin pa dang / dung ser por 'dzin pa'i shes pa'i bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir nges pa dang ma nges pa dang 'gal ba thob pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir khang pa'i nang na gnas pa'i nor bu dang dung dkar po ni sgo gseb na gnas pa'i nor bu 'dzin pa dang / dung ser por 'dzin pa'i shes pa'i bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir nges pa dang ma nges pa dang 'gal ba thob pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, a jewel and a white conch located inside a house are not the object of a consciousness apprehending a jewel and a yellow conch located in a doorway, because they are contradictory with certainty and non-certainty.

original: gal te 'o na ni skad cig ma thob kyang gzhan thob par mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te 'o na ni skad cig ma thob kyang gzhan thob par mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: Obtainment is momentary, but if it is obtained, it is not obtained from another.

original: mngon sum ma nges par thob par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon sum ma nges par thob par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: and it would be obtained without being ascertained by direct perception.

original: de'i phyir tshad ma'i bya ba ni nges par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba de nyams so zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshad ma'i bya ba ni nges par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba de nyams so zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the claim that the function of valid knowledge is to ascertain is undermined.

original: nyams pa med de de ltar yod par mthong ba'i sngon po de nyid skad cig ma'i rang bzhin yin gyi /
analyzed: nyams pa med de de ltar yod par mthong ba'i sngon po de nyid skad cig ma'i rang bzhin yin gyi /
translated: There is no such undermining, because the blue that is seen as existing in that way is itself the nature of a moment.

original: gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not something else.

original: des na ci'i phyir ma nges pa thob pa yin //
analyzed: des na ci'i phyir ma nges pa thob pa yin //
translated: So why is it that it is obtained without being ascertained?

original: gang gi phyir sngon po de skad cig mar ma nges pa'i phyir mngon sum ni sngon po 'ba' zhig thob par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sngon po de skad cig mar ma nges pa'i phyir mngon sum ni sngon po 'ba' zhig thob par byed pa yin no //
translated: Because that blue is not ascertained as a moment, direct perception only obtains the blue.

original: don dam pa'am skad cig ma'i dngos po thob kyang de'i skad cig ma nyid kyis ni thob pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam pa'am skad cig ma'i dngos po thob kyang de'i skad cig ma nyid kyis ni thob pa ma yin te /
translated: Even if the ultimate or the momentary thing is obtained, it is not obtained by the momentariness itself,

original: ma nges pa'i phyir ro //🔽'o na gang @232a * //
analyzed: ma nges pa'i phyir ro // 'o na gang @232a * //
translated: because it is not ascertained.

original: gi tshe thag ring po nas shing la shing nyid du nges shing shing sha par ni ma nges pa de'i tshe shing sha pa nyid gang las thob pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gi tshe thag ring po nas shing la shing nyid du nges shing shing sha par ni ma nges pa de'i tshe shing sha pa nyid gang las thob pa yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, when a tree is ascertained as a tree from a distance, but not ascertained as a simśapā, from what is the simśapā obtained?

original: nyon cig mthong ba'i shing gang yin pa de nyid ni don byed nus pa yin no //
analyzed: nyon cig mthong ba'i shing gang yin pa de nyid ni don byed nus pa yin no //
translated: Listen! That very tree which is seen is capable of performing a function.

original: don byed nus pa yang spyi'i shing nyid ma yin gyi /
analyzed: don byed nus pa yang spyi'i shing nyid ma yin gyi /
translated: And that which is capable of performing a function is not the universal tree,

original: 'on kyang khyad par shing sha pa la sogs pa'i don byed nus pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang khyad par shing sha pa la sogs pa'i don byed nus pa yin no //
translated: but rather it is the particular tree, the śimśapā, etc., that is capable of performing a function.

original: des na sha pa shing nyid du nges par byas pa 'bras bu la nges par sbyor ba'i shing sha pa nyid tshad mas thob pa yin no //
analyzed: des na sha pa shing nyid du nges par byas pa 'bras bu la nges par sbyor ba'i shing sha pa nyid tshad mas thob pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, having ascertained that the śimśapā is a tree, the ascertainment of the śimśapā, which is connected to the result, is the attainment by means of a valid cognition.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of that is this.

original: spyir nges pa ni khyad par gyi mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir spyi'i yul can gyi nges pa ni khyad par gyi thob par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: spyir nges pa ni khyad par gyi mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir spyi'i yul can gyi nges pa ni khyad par gyi thob par byed pa yin no //
translated: In general, ascertainment is the culmination of the particular, and therefore ascertainment that has a universal for its object causes the attainment of the particular.

original: khyad par gyi nges pa ni spyi'i mthar thug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par gyi nges pa ni spyi'i mthar thug pa ma yin te /
translated: Ascertainment of the particular is not the culmination of the universal.

original: gang gi phyir don bya bar ni khyad par dang 'brel pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir don bya bar ni khyad par dang 'brel pa yin gyi /
translated: Because the performance of a function is connected to the particular,

original: spyi la rag las pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi la rag las pa ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not dependent on the universal.

original: khyad par yang mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: khyad par yang mthong ba yin te /
translated: And the particular is seen.

original: de'i phyir de la ni spyi la ltos pa 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de la ni spyi la ltos pa 'ga' yang med do //
translated: Therefore, it does not depend on a universal at all.

original: gal te spyi ma nges na ni tshad ma gzhan las nges par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te spyi ma nges na ni tshad ma gzhan las nges par bya'o //
translated: If the universal is not ascertained, it is ascertained by another means of valid knowledge.

original: ci ste nges na ni don bya ba byed pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir tshad ma de yang khyad par gyi mthar thug pa nyid do //
analyzed: ci ste nges na ni don bya ba byed pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir tshad ma de yang khyad par gyi mthar thug pa nyid do //
translated: But if it is ascertained, then that means of valid knowledge also has a particular as its object, because it performs the function of an object, and so it has an ultimate particular as its object.

original: gal te der tshad ma ni mngon sum nyid yin pa tshad ma'i bya ba ni nges par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te der tshad ma ni mngon sum nyid yin pa tshad ma'i bya ba ni nges par byed pa yin no //
translated: If you say that the means of valid knowledge is perception itself, and the function of the means of valid knowledge is to ascertain,

original: mngon sum sngon po nges par byed pa ltar skad cig ma ma yin pa dang / rdul phra rab ma yin pa nyid du nges pa skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum sngon po nges par byed pa ltar skad cig ma ma yin pa dang / rdul phra rab ma yin pa nyid du nges pa skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: then just as perception ascertains blue, it would also generate the ascertainment that it is not momentary and not a subtle particle.

original: des na gal te skad cig ma yin pa nyid la tshad ma ma yin na //
analyzed: des na gal te skad cig ma yin pa nyid la tshad ma ma yin na //
translated: Therefore, if it is not a means of valid knowledge in regard to momentariness,

original: de sngon po nyid la de ji ltar tshad ma yin /
analyzed: de sngon po nyid la de ji ltar tshad ma yin /
translated: how can it be a means of valid knowledge in regard to blueness?

original: ci shes pa gcig nyid kho na tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: ci shes pa gcig nyid kho na tshad ma yin la /
translated: Is only one cognition a means of valid knowledge,

original: gzhan tshad ma ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan tshad ma ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: and is another not a means of valid knowledge?

original: nyon cig tshad ma'i bya ba ni nges par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: nyon cig tshad ma'i bya ba ni nges par byed pa yin la /
translated: Listen! The function of valid cognition is to ascertain.

original: nges pa yang dngos po'i rang bzhin 'dzin par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nges pa yang dngos po'i rang bzhin 'dzin par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: And ascertainment is not able to apprehend the nature of a thing,

original: phan tshun log pas sgro btags pa'i mthar thug pa yin te /🔽de dang de las ldog pa'i brten nas dngos po gzhan las ldog pa'i mthar thug par rang bzhin du rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: phan tshun log pas sgro btags pa'i mthar thug pa yin te / de dang de las ldog pa'i brten nas dngos po gzhan las ldog pa'i mthar thug par rang bzhin du rtogs par byed do //
translated: because it is the ultimate superimposition of mutual contradiction.🔽It is the ultimate superimposition of the negation of one thing and the affirmation of another.

original: de'i phyir nges pa'i yul ni ldog pa gcig gi mthar thug pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa'i yul ni ldog pa gcig gi mthar thug pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: Therefore, the object of ascertainment is the nature that is the ultimate superimposition of the negation of one thing.

original: nges pa yang tshad ma'i bya ba yin pa'i phyir ldog pa gcig tshad ma'i bya ba yin pas tshad ma'i bya ba ni ldog pa gcig gi rang bzhin gyi mthar thug pa yin pas yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
analyzed: nges pa yang tshad ma'i bya ba yin pa'i phyir ldog pa gcig tshad ma'i bya ba yin pas tshad ma'i bya ba ni ldog pa gcig gi rang bzhin gyi mthar thug pa yin pas yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
translated: And because ascertainment is the function of valid cognition, the function of valid cognition is the ultimate superimposition of the nature that is the negation of one thing. Therefore, it is complete.

original: de @232b ltar gyur na ni sngon po ma yin pa las log pa'i sngon po la ni shes pa de tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: de @232b ltar gyur na ni sngon po ma yin pa las log pa'i sngon po la ni shes pa de tshad ma yin no //
translated: If that were the case, then with respect to blue, the cognition that is the negation of non-blue would be valid cognition.

original: skad cig ma las ldog pa'i skad cig ma ma yin pa la tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma las ldog pa'i skad cig ma ma yin pa la tshad ma yin no //
translated: It is a valid cognition with regard to what is not momentary, which is the opposite of momentary.

original: skad cig ma nyid la ni tshad ma med pa yin gyi /
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid la ni tshad ma med pa yin gyi /
translated: There is no valid cognition with regard to momentariness.

original: tshad ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that there is no valid cognition at all.

original: des na yul du ma la ltos nas tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir mi 'thad pa ci yod /
analyzed: des na yul du ma la ltos nas tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir mi 'thad pa ci yod /
translated: Therefore, there is no incoherence in the fact that valid cognitions and nonvalid cognitions depend on multiple objects.

original: de lta na ni phyogs gcig pa'i yul can tshad mar 'gyur la de ltar 'gyur na yang /
analyzed: de lta na ni phyogs gcig pa'i yul can tshad mar 'gyur la de ltar 'gyur na yang /
translated: If that were so, then a valid cognition would have a part-possessing object. And if that were so,

original: shes pa thams cad tshad mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa thams cad tshad mar 'gyur ro //
translated: then all consciousnesses would be valid cognitions.

original: gang gi phyir gang zhig tha na dngos po tsam la yang mi slu ba ma yin pa'i shes pa de ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang zhig tha na dngos po tsam la yang mi slu ba ma yin pa'i shes pa de ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because there is no consciousness that is not nondeceptive with regard to at least the mere thing.

original: smig rgyu la chur 'du shes pa yang gzugs can nyid dang g-yo ba nyid dang yod pa nyid la mi slu bas tshad mar thal lo zhe na /
analyzed: smig rgyu la chur 'du shes pa yang gzugs can nyid dang g-yo ba nyid dang yod pa nyid la mi slu bas tshad mar thal lo zhe na /
translated: It follows that even the consciousness that conceives a mirage to be water is a valid cognition because it is nondeceptive with regard to its being a form, moving, and existing.

original: nyon cig 'di la spyi rnyed pa de lta ba thams cad ni dngos po med pa yin te /
analyzed: nyon cig 'di la spyi rnyed pa de lta ba thams cad ni dngos po med pa yin te /
translated: Listen, in this regard, all views are nihilistic because they are not obtained in general.

original: spyi'i rang bzhin ma dmigs pa'i phyir dang / spyi la rag las pa'i don bya ba la ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i rang bzhin ma dmigs pa'i phyir dang / spyi la rag las pa'i don bya ba la ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the universal is not observed to exist, and because the activity that depends on the universal is not observed to exist.

original: khyad par ni dngos po yod pa yin te /
analyzed: khyad par ni dngos po yod pa yin te /
translated: Particulars are things that exist.

original: de'i rang bzhin dang de la rag las pa yod par rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu don byed pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin dang de la rag las pa yod par rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu don byed pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cause for positing the existence of their nature and that which depends on them is not observed to perform a function.

original: yod pa ma yin pa'i spyi de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa'i spyi de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that nonexistent universal?

original: skad cig ma nyid dang yod pa nyid dang lus can nyid dang / gzhan du ma'i thun mong bar yongs su brtags pa ste /
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid dang yod pa nyid dang lus can nyid dang / gzhan du ma'i thun mong bar yongs su brtags pa ste /
translated: It is the imagined universal of momentariness, existence, corporeality, and nondifference.

original: spyi ni du ma'i thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi ni du ma'i thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a universal is common to many.

original: skad cig ma nyid gzhan gang zhig yod na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub par bya zhe na /
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid gzhan gang zhig yod na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub par bya zhe na /
translated: If momentariness exists in something else, how is it established by a reason of nature?

original: sgra'i skad cig ma nyid thams cad du ni med pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sgra'i skad cig ma nyid thams cad du ni med pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The momentariness of sound is not nonexistent in all sound.

original: 'on kyang skad cig ma nyid ma yin pa las ldog nas skad cig ma gcig du ma'i thun mong du brtags pa yang yin pa de 'dra ba med kyi sngon po la sogs pa'i khyad par so sor tha dad pa gang yin pa de ni yod pa kho
analyzed: 'on kyang skad cig ma nyid ma yin pa las ldog nas skad cig ma gcig du ma'i thun mong du brtags pa yang yin pa de 'dra ba med kyi sngon po la sogs pa'i khyad par so sor tha dad pa gang yin pa de ni yod pa kho
translated: The individual instances of blue, etc., which are distinct from each other, are indeed existent.

original: na'o // de ltar yin yang spyi gang yin pa de ni khyad par gyi bdag nyid kho na'o //
analyzed: na'o // de ltar yin yang spyi gang yin pa de ni khyad par gyi bdag nyid kho na'o //
translated: But the universal is just the nature of the particular.

original: yod pa yin zhing khyad par gyi mthar thug pa kho nar gzung bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yod pa yin zhing khyad par gyi mthar thug pa kho nar gzung bar bya ba yin no //
translated: It is existent and is apprehended only as the ultimate particular.

original: khyad par med dam ma bzung na ni spyi yang med par ma bzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par med dam ma bzung na ni spyi yang med par ma bzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the particular is not apprehended, then the universal is not apprehended as nonexistent.

original: de'i phyir khyad par yod na ni spyi yod la khyad par med na ni spyi yang med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par yod na ni spyi yod la khyad par med na ni spyi yang med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, if the particular exists, the universal exists; if the particular does not exist, the universal does not exist.

original: de ltar gyur na smig rgyu la chur shes pa chu med na @233a * //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na smig rgyu la chur shes pa chu med na @233a * //
translated: If that were so, then the cognition of water in a mirage would not be a cognition of the absence of water.

original: chu'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang skad cig ma nyid dam lus can nyid la sogs pa med cing /
analyzed: chu'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang skad cig ma nyid dam lus can nyid la sogs pa med cing /
translated: The nature of water is not a thing that transforms, nor is it momentary or corporeal.

original: dkar po'i rang bzhin btang na de'i ngo bor 'gyur ba'i dbyibs med pa yin no //
analyzed: dkar po'i rang bzhin btang na de'i ngo bor 'gyur ba'i dbyibs med pa yin no //
translated: If the nature of whiteness is relinquished, then the shape that transforms into that nature does not exist.

original: phyogs 'dis khyad par la mi slu ba spyis thams cad bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: phyogs 'dis khyad par la mi slu ba spyis thams cad bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: In this way, the nondeceptiveness with regard to the specific is explained by the generality.

original: khyad par la mi slu ba la yang la lar spyi la slu ba'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par la mi slu ba la yang la lar spyi la slu ba'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: However, because the nondeceptiveness with regard to the specific is sometimes deceptive with regard to the generality, it is not valid knowledge.

original: khyad par la ni tshad ma nyid do //
analyzed: khyad par la ni tshad ma nyid do //
translated: It is valid knowledge with regard to the specific.

original: gal te nges par byas pa la mi slu ba tshad ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te nges par byas pa la mi slu ba tshad ma yin na /
translated: If nondeceptiveness with regard to what is ascertained is valid knowledge,

original: 'o na ni cha shad dang skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid mthong zheng zhen par byas pa las mi slu ba yod pa de'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'o na ni cha shad dang skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid mthong zheng zhen par byas pa las mi slu ba yod pa de'i phyir te /
translated: then since nondeceptiveness exists with regard to what is seen and ascertained as not being a line or a moment,

original: yang yod pa dang de la dmigs pa'i yang tshad mar 'gyur ro zhe na bden te /
analyzed: yang yod pa dang de la dmigs pa'i yang tshad mar 'gyur ro zhe na bden te /
translated: then that would be valid knowledge that observes existence.

original: gang la mi slu ba mthong ba nges par de ni yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: gang la mi slu ba mthong ba nges par de ni yod pa nyid de /
translated: It is true that if nondeceptiveness is seen with regard to what is ascertained, then that is existence.

original: snam bu'i bgo ba la sogs pa'i don byed pa yan lag can yin par mi 'thad de /
analyzed: snam bu'i bgo ba la sogs pa'i don byed pa yan lag can yin par mi 'thad de /
translated: It is not tenable that the cloth and so on, which are the wholes, perform a function.

original: tshad mas gsal bas na don byed pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad mas gsal bas na don byed pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are established by valid cognition, it is not tenable that they perform a function.

original: skad cig ma ma yin pa yang ngo //
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin pa yang ngo //
translated: They are not momentary.

original: don byed pa de ni tshad mas 'thad pa'i rdul phra rab dang skad cig ma kho nas yongs su rdzogs pa yin gyi //
analyzed: don byed pa de ni tshad mas 'thad pa'i rdul phra rab dang skad cig ma kho nas yongs su rdzogs pa yin gyi //
translated: That function is completely fulfilled only by the atoms and moments that are established by valid cognition.

original: yan lag can nam skad cig ma ma yin pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yan lag can nam skad cig ma ma yin pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not fulfilled by the wholes or by what is not momentary.

original: snang ba 'di ni rags pa gcig tu mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba 'di ni rags pa gcig tu mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because this appearance does not appear as a single coarse object.

original: rags pa yin na gcig pu 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
analyzed: rags pa yin na gcig pu 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
translated: Because if it were coarse, it would be contradictory for it to be a single thing.

original: de bzhin du skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid du ni yun ring du mi gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid du ni yun ring du mi gnas pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, it is not tenable that it endures for a long time, because it is not momentary.

original: de ni mthong ba'i skad cig mas lta bar nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni mthong ba'i skad cig mas lta bar nus pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not possible to see it with the momentary eye consciousness.

original: yun ring du gnas pa snga phyi cha shas med pa'i mthong bas ji ltar lta bar byed /
analyzed: yun ring du gnas pa snga phyi cha shas med pa'i mthong bas ji ltar lta bar byed /
translated: How could it be seen by the eye consciousness, which sees what endures for a long time without parts that are earlier and later?

original: mthong ba'i skad cig ma ma yin du chug kyang lta ba'i bya ba ni snga phyi cha shas med pa nyid de /
analyzed: mthong ba'i skad cig ma ma yin du chug kyang lta ba'i bya ba ni snga phyi cha shas med pa nyid de /
translated: Even if it is not the case that seeing is momentary, the action of seeing is without earlier and later parts.

original: skad cig ma dang po mthong ba las phyis mthong bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma dang po mthong ba las phyis mthong bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible to see later on what was seen in the first moment.

original: de ltar gyur na yang 'byung ba dang 'byung ba'i bya ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin gyi snga ma dang phyi ma cha shas med pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir yun ring por 'dug pa'i rang bzhin ni mthong ba'i bya ba'i gzung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na yang 'byung ba dang 'byung ba'i bya ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin gyi snga ma dang phyi ma cha shas med pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir yun ring por 'dug pa'i rang bzhin ni mthong ba'i bya ba'i gzung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Even if that were so, the essence of the object of the action of arising is not without earlier and later parts, and thus the essence of something that endures for a long time is not the object of the action of seeing.

original: de'i phyir snang ba gang yin pa de ni skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid kyi thun mong ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir snang ba gang yin pa de ni skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid kyi thun mong ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, that which appears is not momentary, but is common to all.

original: des na skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid mthong ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: des na skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid mthong ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Thus, it is not the case that what is not momentary is seen.

original: 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan 'ba' zhig las nges pa skyed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan 'ba' zhig las nges pa skyed pa yin te /
translated: It is only a mistaken reason that produces ascertainment.

original: dper na gcig dang 'gal ba mthong ba yang @233b gcig tu zhen par byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gcig dang 'gal ba mthong ba yang @233b gcig tu zhen par byed pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, even though one sees what is contradictory to one thing, one conceives of it as one thing.

original: gal te thob par byed pa tshad ma ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te thob par byed pa tshad ma ma yin na /
translated: If that which obtains is not a valid cognition,

original: 'o na thob par byed pa ma yin pa tshad mar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na thob par byed pa ma yin pa tshad mar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then that which does not obtain would not be a valid cognition.

original: kva'i thob par byed pa de'i tshad ma spang ba thob pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: kva'i thob par byed pa de'i tshad ma spang ba thob pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Obtaining is not the abandonment of the valid cognition that obtains,

original: gang gi phyir thob pa ni phyis kyi shes pa'i khyad par yin na de ji ltar shes pa snga ma snga ma'i rang bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir thob pa ni phyis kyi shes pa'i khyad par yin na de ji ltar shes pa snga ma snga ma'i rang bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: because obtaining is a later specific cognition, so how could it be the nature of the earlier cognition?

original: tshad ma ni nus pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma ni nus pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin no //
translated: A valid cognition is nothing other than the nature of potentiality.

original: de'i phyir thob par byed pa yang thog par nus pa'i tshad ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir thob par byed pa yang thog par nus pa'i tshad ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, that which obtains is a valid cognition that has the nature of potentiality.

original: thob pa nyid ni ma yin no //🔽thob pa'i nus pa de yang don med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thob pa nyid ni ma yin no // thob pa'i nus pa de yang don med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Obtaining is not a valid cognition.🔽Because that potentiality of obtaining does not occur if the object does not exist.

original: don med na mi 'byung ba de ni gang zhig thob par mi byed pa de la yang yod pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no //
