analyzed: don med na mi 'byung ba de ni gang zhig thob par mi byed pa de la yang yod pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no //
translated: That which does not occur if the object does not exist is a valid cognition even in regard to that which it does not obtain.

original: gal te de ltar na don thob pa ni nus pa'i rgyu mtshan don med na mi 'byung ba tshad ma gang gi yul yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na don thob pa ni nus pa'i rgyu mtshan don med na mi 'byung ba tshad ma gang gi yul yin zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then what is the object of the valid knowledge that is the reason for the attainment of the object?

original: mngon sum gyi'o //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi'o //
translated: It is direct perception.

original: don nges par byed pa'i mngon sum gyi bdag nyid don gsal bar byed par nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de nyid don med na mi 'byung bar nges pa yin pa'i phyir nges par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: don nges par byed pa'i mngon sum gyi bdag nyid don gsal bar byed par nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de nyid don med na mi 'byung bar nges pa yin pa'i phyir nges par byed pa yin no //
translated: That which is the nature of direct perception that ascertains the object is the experience that clarifies the object. That itself is the ascertainment that the object does not occur if the object does not exist.

original: yang gang gi tshe /
analyzed: yang gang gi tshe /
translated: Moreover, when

original: don la the tshom za ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: don la the tshom za ba de'i tshe /
translated: one doubts the object,

original: bdag nyid la yang the tshom za bar 'gyur bas gzhan las yin par 'dod de /
analyzed: bdag nyid la yang the tshom za bar 'gyur bas gzhan las yin par 'dod de /
translated: one doubts oneself. Therefore, it is asserted that it is from another.

original: the tshom ni mngon sum la gnod par byed pa ma yin no zhes sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: the tshom ni mngon sum la gnod par byed pa ma yin no zhes sngar bshad zin to //
translated: Doubt does not harm direct perception. This was explained earlier.

original: tshad ma mngon sum yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi tshad ma ma yin pa yang yul nyams su myong ba'i mngon sum nyid do //
analyzed: tshad ma mngon sum yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi tshad ma ma yin pa yang yul nyams su myong ba'i mngon sum nyid do //
translated: Not only is valid knowledge direct perception, but also invalid knowledge is direct perception that experiences the object.

original: gang gi phyir zhugs pa'i skyes bu la smig rgyu'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i mngon sum skyes pa de nyid du chu'i shes pa tshad ma ma yin par 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhugs pa'i skyes bu la smig rgyu'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i mngon sum skyes pa de nyid du chu'i shes pa tshad ma ma yin par 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: Because, in the case of a person who has entered upon the mirage, the direct perception that apprehends the nature of the mirage is itself the apprehension of the nonexistence of the cognition of water.

original: gang gi phyir don med par 'dzin pa nyid ni tshad ma ma yin la smig rgyu'i de kho na nges par byed pa nyid kyang sgro btags pa'i chu med par nges par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don med par 'dzin pa nyid ni tshad ma ma yin la smig rgyu'i de kho na nges par byed pa nyid kyang sgro btags pa'i chu med par nges par byed pa yin no //
translated: And the apprehension of nonexistence is itself the valid cognition that ascertains the reality of the mirage, and it is also the ascertainment of the nonexistence of the superimposed water.

original: de lta na yang ji ltar bum pas dben pa'i sa phyogs shes pa nges par byed pa nyid bum pa'i shes pa nges par byed pa yin pa des na bum pa shes pa med pa mngon sum nyid yin pa de bzhin du 'di la yang shes par bya'o
analyzed: de lta na yang ji ltar bum pas dben pa'i sa phyogs shes pa nges par byed pa nyid bum pa'i shes pa nges par byed pa yin pa des na bum pa shes pa med pa mngon sum nyid yin pa de bzhin du 'di la yang shes par bya'o
translated: And just as the cognition of a place devoid of a pot ascertains the pot, and therefore the cognition of the pot is not a valid cognition, in the same way, it should be understood that the cognition of the place devoid of the pot ascertains the nonexistence of the pot, and therefore the cognition of the nonexistence of the pot is also not a valid cognition.

original: // 'dir shes pa phyi ma dang / tshad ma ma yin pa'i shes pa snga ma go bya go byed ni ma yin te /
analyzed: // 'dir shes pa phyi ma dang / tshad ma ma yin pa'i shes pa snga ma go bya go byed ni ma yin te /
translated: In this case, the later cognition and the earlier non-valid cognition are not the object of understanding and the means of understanding.

original: gang grub na gang ma grub pa de ni de'i rtags brjod pa yin gyi gcig par grub pa dag ni rtags dang @234a * //
analyzed: gang grub na gang ma grub pa de ni de'i rtags brjod pa yin gyi gcig par grub pa dag ni rtags dang @234a * //
translated: If something is not established, then that is stated as the reason for it.🔽

original: rtags can gyi dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: rtags can gyi dngos po ma yin no //
translated: If something is established, then that which is not established is said to be the reason for it. But that which is established as one is not the thing that is the reason and that which has the reason.

original: gal te tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa mngon sum yin na /
analyzed: gal te tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa mngon sum yin na /
translated: If valid cognition and invalid cognition are direct perception,

original: 'o na / tshad dang cig shos spyi gzhag dang // zhes bya ba dang / chos mthun pa ji lta ba las de ltar nges par byed pa na rjes su dpag par bya ba las ma 'das so zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na / tshad dang cig shos spyi gzhag dang // zhes bya ba dang / chos mthun pa ji lta ba las de ltar nges par byed pa na rjes su dpag par bya ba las ma 'das so zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /
translated: then how should one understand what has been explained, namely, that “the general characteristics of valid cognition and its opposite are posited,” and that “when one ascertains something in accordance with what is similar, one does not go beyond what is to be inferred”?

original: smras pa rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i nyams su ma myong ba rnams ni nyams su myong ba'i shes pa gsal ba rnams dang chos mthun pa mthong ba'i rjes su dpag pas tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa na nye bar
analyzed: smras pa rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i nyams su ma myong ba rnams ni nyams su myong ba'i shes pa gsal ba rnams dang chos mthun pa mthong ba'i rjes su dpag pas tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa na nye bar
translated: We say that when one understands the nature of valid cognition and invalid cognition through inference based on seeing what is similar to one’s own and others’ continua that have not been experienced, one understands the nature of valid cognition and invalid cognition through the clear consciousness that experiences.

original: ston par byed kyi rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i nyams su myong ba nyid la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ston par byed kyi rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i nyams su myong ba nyid la ni ma yin te /
translated: It is the teacher who teaches it, not the experience that exists in one's own mind stream.

original: de dag gis ni de dag la tha snyad du bya bar mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gis ni de dag la tha snyad du bya bar mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not the experience that exists in one’s own continuum, because it is not possible to conventionally designate those as valid or invalid cognitions.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mdor spyir smos pa bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mdor spyir smos pa bya ste /
translated: Therefore, it is stated in brief:

original: gzhan du tshad ma dang cig shos gzhag pa dang zhes spyi ma smos par gsung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du tshad ma dang cig shos gzhag pa dang zhes spyi ma smos par gsung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “Otherwise, valid cognition and its opposite would be posited without a general term.”

original: gal te rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i shes pa'i gsal ba'i rnams kyang rjes su dpag pa nyid las tshad ma dang tshang ma ma yin pa yin /
analyzed: gal te rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i shes pa'i gsal ba'i rnams kyang rjes su dpag pa nyid las tshad ma dang tshang ma ma yin pa yin /
translated: If the clarity of consciousness that exists in one’s own continuum is valid cognition or invalid cognition only from inference,

original: ji tar slob don nyams su myong ba'i yul can gyi shes pa'i gsal ba rnams las ma gtogs pa zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji tar slob don nyams su myong ba'i yul can gyi shes pa'i gsal ba rnams las ma gtogs pa zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then why did the master say, “Except for the clarity of consciousness that is the subject of the experience of one’s own object of knowledge”?

original: gang gi tshe shes pa gsal ba thams cad rjes su dpag pa las tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin na ni de'i tshe ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba smos pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe shes pa gsal ba thams cad rjes su dpag pa las tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin na ni de'i tshe ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba smos pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If all the clarity of consciousness is valid cognition or invalid cognition from inference, then at that time the statement “except for” would be meaningless.

original: nyams su myong ba smos pa ni tshad ma ma yin ba'i don du ste /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba smos pa ni tshad ma ma yin ba'i don du ste /
translated: The experience is mentioned in the sense of non-valid cognition.

original: ji srid yul med par nyams su ma myong ba de srid du tshad ma ma yin par shes par mi nus pa de'i phyir na gang gi yul med par nyams su myong ba de ni tshad ma ma yin par shes par bya'o zhes brjod pa'i phyir yang nyams🔽su myong ba'i yul can smos so //
analyzed: ji srid yul med par nyams su ma myong ba de srid du tshad ma ma yin par shes par mi nus pa de'i phyir na gang gi yul med par nyams su myong ba de ni tshad ma ma yin par shes par bya'o zhes brjod pa'i phyir yang nyams su myong ba'i yul can smos so //
translated: As long as one does not experience the non-existence of an object, one cannot know that it is non-valid cognition. Therefore, in order to say that one should know that it is non-valid cognition when one experiences the non-existence of its object, the experience of the object is mentioned.

original: tshad mar nges pa'i yang yul nyams su myong ba med na ni mi 'gyur bas tshad mar shes pa yang tshad mas yul nyams su myong ba las nges par 'gyur ba yin no zhes brjod pa'i phyir yang nyams su myong ba'i yul can zhes smos so //
analyzed: tshad mar nges pa'i yang yul nyams su myong ba med na ni mi 'gyur bas tshad mar shes pa yang tshad mas yul nyams su myong ba las nges par 'gyur ba yin no zhes brjod pa'i phyir yang nyams su myong ba'i yul can zhes smos so //
translated: If one does not experience the object of the ascertainment of valid cognition, it would not occur. Therefore, in order to say that the ascertainment of valid cognition occurs from the experience of the object by valid cognition, the experience of the object is mentioned.

original: gal te shes pa snga ma dang chos mtshungs pa las shes pa phyi ma tshad mar nges na mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te shes pa snga ma dang chos mtshungs pa las shes pa phyi ma tshad mar nges na mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: If the later cognition is ascertained as valid cognition from its similarity to the former cognition, is it not that it is not direct perception?

original: mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not that it is not direct perception.

original: gang gi 'di ni shes pa snga @234b ma dang 'dra'o zhes de ltar ni brtag pa 'ga' yang med kyi /
analyzed: gang gi 'di ni shes pa snga @234b ma dang 'dra'o zhes de ltar ni brtag pa 'ga' yang med kyi /
translated: But there is no such investigation, “This is like a previous cognition.”

original: 'o na kyang tha snyad 'gog pa las shes pa'i rtogs pa nyid na tshad mar nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na kyang tha snyad 'gog pa las shes pa'i rtogs pa nyid na tshad mar nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: Rather, when a cognition is ascertained as valid, it is ascertained as valid in the context of refuting the conventional.

original: yang na nyams su myong ma thag kho nar shes pa thams cad don med na mi 'byung /🔽rtogs pa yin pa de bas na phyis the tshom 'byung yang tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa ni mngon sum nyid kyis 'dzin yin no //
analyzed: yang na nyams su myong ma thag kho nar shes pa thams cad don med na mi 'byung / rtogs pa yin pa de bas na phyis the tshom 'byung yang tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa ni mngon sum nyid kyis 'dzin yin no //
translated: Or, if all cognitions do not occur without an object, then the subsequent doubt would be a valid cognition.

original: gzhan yang ji srid mngon sum gyis byung ba'i zhe na pas tha dad pa med par bzung ba'i dngos po de dag las dngos po gcig la rgyu dang 'bras bu nyed du bzung na thams cad gzung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang ji srid mngon sum gyis byung ba'i zhe na pas tha dad pa med par bzung ba'i dngos po de dag las dngos po gcig la rgyu dang 'bras bu nyed du bzung na thams cad gzung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Moreover, as long as the object is apprehended without distinction by the cognition that arises from direct perception, then when one thing is apprehended as cause and effect among those things, all are apprehended.

original: ji ltar shes pa gcig la brdar byas na spyi med kyang ngo bo gcig zhe na ba'i gzung ba'i 'gyur ba'i shing mtha' dag la brdar byas par 'gyur ba de bzhin du me tha dad kyang mer shes pa'i rten yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsung🔽ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar shes pa gcig la brdar byas na spyi med kyang ngo bo gcig zhe na ba'i gzung ba'i 'gyur ba'i shing mtha' dag la brdar byas par 'gyur ba de bzhin du me tha dad kyang mer shes pa'i rten yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If you say that just as when a convention is made with respect to one cognition, although there is no universal, all trees are apprehended as having the same nature, in the same way, although fire is different, it is the basis of the cognition of fire, this is not so, because it is not established that the convention is made with respect to all trees.

original: gal te me 'di du ba'i rgyu yin la du ba 'di me'i 'bras bu yin te /
analyzed: gal te me 'di du ba'i rgyu yin la du ba 'di me'i 'bras bu yin te /
translated: If you say that this fire is the cause of smoke and this smoke is the effect of fire,

original: sngar mthong ba dang chos mthun pa'i phyir na sngar mthong ba'i me dang du ba bzhin no zhes chos mthun pa'i rtags las rjes su dpag bar bya ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: sngar mthong ba dang chos mthun pa'i phyir na sngar mthong ba'i me dang du ba bzhin no zhes chos mthun pa'i rtags las rjes su dpag bar bya ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: because it is similar to what was seen before, it is inferred from a reason that is similar to the predicate, like the fire and smoke seen before,

original: chos mthun pa'i rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: chos mthun pa'i rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: then it is not so, because there are two types of similarity.

original: snang ba dang brtag pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba dang brtag pa'o //
translated: There is similarity of appearance and similarity of conception.

original: de la tshogs pa nges par ma rtogs pa de nyid yin no zhes gcig tu zhen par byas pa'am nges par rtogs pa ste 'di ni sngar mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de la tshogs pa nges par ma rtogs pa de nyid yin no zhes gcig tu zhen par byas pa'am nges par rtogs pa ste 'di ni sngar mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is the same as that which was seen before, because it is similar to what was seen before, then it is ascertained or conceived as one, or it is ascertained, but it is not established that the convention is made with respect to all trees.

original: nges par bzung ba shing la sogs pa rnams la mthong ba'i tshogs pa chos mthun pa yod pa yin na de'i rgyu tha dad pa can gyi reg pa dang myangs pas 'khru ba'i aa ru ra dag la yang yod pa yin no //
analyzed: nges par bzung ba shing la sogs pa rnams la mthong ba'i tshogs pa chos mthun pa yod pa yin na de'i rgyu tha dad pa can gyi reg pa dang myangs pas 'khru ba'i aa ru ra dag la yang yod pa yin no //
translated: If the collection of things seen in the case of wood, etc., were definitely ascertained, then the cause of that, contact, would also exist in myrobalan plums, which are different from the cause, since they are wet.

original: de'i phyir gcig gi skyed pa nyid la yang 'khrul ba'i phyir rtags ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gcig gi skyed pa nyid la yang 'khrul ba'i phyir rtags ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since there is error even in the production of one thing, it is not a reason.

original: cha shas chos mthun pa ni ba lang dang ba men mthong ba dag la yod pa yin no //
analyzed: cha shas chos mthun pa ni ba lang dang ba men mthong ba dag la yod pa yin no //
translated: Similarity of parts is found in the seeing of a cow and a gayal.

original: mthong ba de ni tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i phyir ma mthong ba rva can gyi rtags yin yang rva la sogs pa mthong ba ni mthong ba'i cha shas gzhan rjes su dpag par bya ba med pas rtags ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba de ni tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i phyir ma mthong ba rva can gyi rtags yin yang rva la sogs pa mthong ba ni mthong ba'i cha shas gzhan rjes su dpag par bya ba med pas rtags ma yin no //
translated: Since that seeing depends on a single collection, even though the horn-possessor is a reason for the unseen, the seeing of the horn, etc., is not a reason, since there is no inference of another part of the seen.

original: brtag ba'i chos mthun pa ni chos gzhan gyis byas pa ste /
analyzed: brtag ba'i chos mthun pa ni chos gzhan gyis byas pa ste /
translated: Similarity of examined properties is produced by another property.

original: dper na byas pas byas pa sgra dang bum pa gnyis kyi lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na byas pas byas pa sgra dang bum pa gnyis kyi lta bu ste /
translated: For example, like the two, sound and pot, which are produced by being produced.

original: gang la ltos nas chos mthun pa can gyi rjes su dpag par 'gyur ba'am mi rtag ba nyid kyis byas te /
analyzed: gang la ltos nas chos mthun pa can gyi rjes su dpag par 'gyur ba'am mi rtag ba nyid kyis byas te /
translated: The reason is the property of the subject, because it is the property of the subject in relation to which the inference is similar to the property.

original: @235a * // gang la brten nas chos mthun pa'i dper 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @235a * // gang la brten nas chos mthun pa'i dper 'gyur ro //
translated: The example is similar to the property because it is similar to impermanence.

original: de yang chos gzhan nyid gtan tshigs su brjod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de yang chos gzhan nyid gtan tshigs su brjod pa yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, the other property is stated as the reason.

original: des byas pa chos mthun pas the tshom za bas ci zhig bya dngos po nyid la sogs pas byas pa'i chos mthun pa ni 'khrul pas brtags pa ma yin la /
analyzed: des byas pa chos mthun pas the tshom za bas ci zhig bya dngos po nyid la sogs pas byas pa'i chos mthun pa ni 'khrul pas brtags pa ma yin la /
translated: What is the use of the doubt that is similar to the property of being produced? The similarity of the property of being produced by a thing and so on is not imagined to be mistaken.

original: bskyed par bya ba nyid kyis khyad par 'gyur ba'i chos mthun par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba nyid kyis khyad par 'gyur ba'i chos mthun par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: The similarity of the property that is distinguished by being produced is not the case.

original: lus can ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa gnyis ni chos kyis byas pa'i chos mthun par 'gyur na /
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa gnyis ni chos kyis byas pa'i chos mthun par 'gyur na /
translated: If the two non-embodied consciousnesses are similar to the property of being produced,

original: de la yang chos de nyid tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs yin gyi chos mthun pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de la yang chos de nyid tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs yin gyi chos mthun pa ni ma yin no //
translated: then in that case, that very property is the reason for valid cognition and invalid cognition, but it is not similar to the property.

original: gal te yul dang dus dang gsal bar byed pa'i khyad par can du 'gyur ba shes pa na mthong ba'i phyir 'di ni dngos po yin pa yin te /🔽sngar mthong ba yin no zhes dngos po yod par grub na shes pa yang tshad mar grub po zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yul dang dus dang gsal bar byed pa'i khyad par can du 'gyur ba shes pa na mthong ba'i phyir 'di ni dngos po yin pa yin te / sngar mthong ba yin no zhes dngos po yod par grub na shes pa yang tshad mar grub po zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is a thing because it is perceived as having the attributes of a particular place, time, and illuminator,🔽and that if the existence of the thing is established, then the perception is also established as valid cognition,

original: mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin la gang zhig yod pa rjes su dpag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin la gang zhig yod pa rjes su dpag par 'gyur te /
translated: then we reply that the nature of the thing that is perceived is inferred from its existence.

original: de'i phyir 'di la rjes su dpag pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di la rjes su dpag pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not inferred here.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa dag gis rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid gcig la mthong na tha mi dad pa'i zhen pas gzung bar bya ba'i dngos po gzhan thams cad mthong ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa dag gis rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid gcig la mthong na tha mi dad pa'i zhen pas gzung bar bya ba'i dngos po gzhan thams cad mthong ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, if cause and effect are perceived by perception and non-apprehension, then all other things that are apprehended by non-different conceptualization are perceived.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is not to be inferred,

original: dran par bya ba yin no zhes nges so //
analyzed: dran par bya ba yin no zhes nges so //
translated: but is to be remembered. This is certain.

original: de'i phyir de ltar skyed par byed pa nyid gcig la mthong na gzhan la dran par bya ba yin gyi rjes su dpag par bya ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar skyed par byed pa nyid gcig la mthong na gzhan la dran par bya ba yin gyi rjes su dpag par bya ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, when one sees that something is a producer in one case, it should be remembered that it is a producer in another case, but it should not be inferred,

original: rgyu rnams la ni 'bras bu 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu rnams la ni 'bras bu 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because effects are not invariably concomitant with their causes.

original: de nyid kyi phyir tshogs pa las 'bras bu rjes su dpag pa ma yin par bshad do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir tshogs pa las 'bras bu rjes su dpag pa ma yin par bshad do //
translated: For this very reason, it is explained that an effect is not inferred from a collection of causes.

original: dran pa ni yod kyang spangs te don gzhan la ltos nas rtags su bshad do //
analyzed: dran pa ni yod kyang spangs te don gzhan la ltos nas rtags su bshad do //
translated: Although memory exists, it is set aside and explained as a logical reason in dependence on another object.

original: gal te 'dra pa rtags yin na ni gcig kyang 'dra ba yin pa de'i phyir de yang yongs su brtags nas brtags pa'i mthar bzung ba yul gyi rjes su dpag par bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te 'dra pa rtags yin na ni gcig kyang 'dra ba yin pa de'i phyir de yang yongs su brtags nas brtags pa'i mthar bzung ba yul gyi rjes su dpag par bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: If similarity is a logical reason, then even a single thing is similar. Therefore, it would be inferred as the object that is grasped at the end of examination, after being examined.

original: res 'ga' de las 'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: res 'ga' de las 'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar ro //
translated: Sometimes an effect would exist from that.

original: 'bras bu res 'ga' ba'i yul nyid kyang tshogs pa nyid la nges kyi /
analyzed: 'bras bu res 'ga' ba'i yul nyid kyang tshogs pa nyid la nges kyi /
translated: The object that is sometimes an effect is ascertained in the collection itself,

original: dngos po gcig la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po gcig la ni ma yin no //
translated: but not in a single thing.

original: 'bras bu 'gar yang ma nges la tshad ma'i yul ni nges pa yin te /🔽de'i phyir skyed par byed pa @235b nyid kyi shes pa lkog tu gyur pa la skyes pa ni dran pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'bras bu 'gar yang ma nges la tshad ma'i yul ni nges pa yin te / de'i phyir skyed par byed pa @235b nyid kyi shes pa lkog tu gyur pa la skyes pa ni dran pa yin gyi /
translated: But the object of valid cognition is ascertained.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the cognition of the hidden object that is produced by the cause that produces it is memory, not inference.

original: de ltar yang de mthong ba nyid na mthong ba rnams la myong ba'i mthu las byung ba'i dran pa las zhes gsungs te /
